atlantis rebuild match 3
a deep ocean underwater jewels adventure

Start an exciting Match 3 game and play through many challenging underwater levels! Solve exciting puzzles and bonus games, win upgrades and extras, and help Athena & Zeus fulfill their dream of Atlantis!

title: Red Ball 4 : Ball in the Wild Jungle Adventures
description:
Red Ball 4 : Red Ball in the Wild Jungle Adventures
Red Ball 4 is a classic running and jumping platform game, Red Ball 4 in the wild Jungle Adventures one of the best jungle running Adventure Games.
This is a free game where the little Red Ball and Blue Ball has a mission, he must smash enemies to pass so many threats .Are you willing to help the litlle Red Ball and Blue Ball avoid dangers and collect mushrooms.
In this Red Ball Jump Adventure Game, the little Red Ball and Blue Ball has to run all the way in order to collect coins and power-ups to fight with the bosses.
Our little Red Ball and Blue Ball needs to run into the jungle and to swing through vines and take mushrooms
Roll, jump and bounce through 80 exciting levels full of adventure.
Are you ready? well if you are, this is a very easy game to play and free to download. Enjoy the Blue Ball Run adventures with the little Red Ball and Blue Ball.

How to Play:

> To move Blue Ball / Red Ball character click on right or left on the control pad
> Press Jump-button AND right or left for running
> Press B-button to make Blue Ball / Red Ball jump
> Click down to get it in some tree stumps in order to go to a bonus level!
> Blue Ball / Red Ball swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher

Best Features:
> Red Ball has a lot of levels
> 80 beautiful, well-designed and challening levels
> Free game without internet
> 5 different amazing worlds  with Jungle, Desert, forest, beach, fire world.
> Amazing gameplay reminding us of retro classic games
> Many power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items
> The run adventure is a colorful game , Wonderful High-resolution Graphics
> Great photograph and lovely Red Ball
> easy and free to play
> A lot of enemies with different difficulties

We hope all the users have a great time playing this new Red Ball Adventure Platformer Game.

Enjoy this brand new Red Ball : Red Ball in the Wild Jungle Adventures for free, Download Now and Enjoy the Wild Jungle Adventures!

title: Knock Glass - Make Happy Glass By Draw lines
description:
Draw Lines to Fill the Glass and Save Water is New Draw lines game with water and Glass Concept, 
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with ice cubes using dots brain physics and smile again!

The perfect Happy Glass Brain Physics : Knock down Glass , new piano music play, not step on the white pieces! Follow the music click on the color, simple operation, rich gameplay! Can balanced sokoban with a small partner, so you have a perfect music worddle beyond imagination feast!

Try to find the best way to complete each level in brainy dots. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box using brain physics!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars pudelek.

Happy Glass Brain Physics : Knock down Glass Features :

* dynamic mechanism. Draw lines & use brain freely to complete levels!
The only thing you need to do is to “fill glass”
Will you be able to clear these simple-looking but actually difficult stages?

▼ The rules are simple!

◆ Let's bump the two balls
All you need to do to clear a stage is to 
“fill glass with ice cubes to make glass happy”.
Draw lines and shapes freely to move and roll the ice cubes.
Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.

◆ Your brain abilities will be tested
This game, continuing after Brain Wars, also tests your logical thinking and the flexibility of your mind.
As this game includes the elements of riddle and “Escape the Room” type of games, we would recommend Brain Dots to people who enjoy brain-type puzzles, cards and strategy games.
It might also have an impact on your children’s intellectual growth and preventing brain deterioration?

When you hit the target with a ball, the target knocks down or explodes.
Achieve the stage score to clear then challenge the next level.
In this game you have to break piano glass tiles as fast as you can.You don't have enough time to think just tap tap on glass tiles and progress as much as can in happy glass tiles.

Glass Tiles have two modes : 
1. Speed mode
2. Color mode.

In speed mode you have to knock hit & knock down happy glass tiles.But you have to do it fast as speed is increasing in hit & knock down mode.
In color mode hit & knock right color to progress further.

Happy Glass Brain Physics : Knock down Glass modes

- Ball limit mode: Hit the can, Break dishes, Score target, Hit the fruit 
- Time limit mode: Hit the folder target, Shoot the parachute, Hit the oil drums, Hit the roly-poly toy
So download brainy dots from playstore and enjoy unlimited brain puzzles.
How to Play Fill the Glass Game
Draw Physics lines to Release water in Glass Complete levels Easily

description:
Bounc.io is a fun new 2-player io game inspired by the best io games and balls games. Play head-to-head against an opponent in real time to see who can break the most blocks.

Use an array of power-ups to your advantage.  Use the x2 power-up to do double damage to your blocks, or use the Slow power-up to instantly slow down your opponent!

Game Features:
- Real-time multiplayer PvP
- Simple and easy to use controls
- Unique powerups
- Rare heroes to collect

We love to hear from our players!

Instagram @bounc.io #bouncio
Twitter @bouncio #bouncio
FaceBook http://fb.me/bounc.io


 PERMISSIONS: 
 Bounc.io requests permission to read and write to your external storage to buffer and enhance your video ad experience. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions. Video ads are shown when using a regular account. They help fund the production of Bounc.io, so we appreciate your support. If you have any questions regarding permissions, please contact us at hello@bounc.io.

title: Tornado.io!
description:
Make trees and roofs of houses twist in air, destroy more and become bigger. 
Experience a battle in a small arena - fight with other tornadoes for the first place!
Challenge your friends in a TOTAL DESTRUCTION competition!
 
Tornado.io! Create and direct each tornado as you attempt to increase your score, increase the destruction and unlock all the of the achievements. 

In this simulator, you will play as a black hole, but that is not a usual game, here you are in the multiplayer mode, which means that your hexar will have to eliminate weaker holes and run away from stronger ones. Swallow trees, cars, buildings and everything you can see on your way to make your hole bigger. When you think your hole is big enough just enter the battle and eliminate everyone you can see, unless you see a hexar, which looks bigger than yours does. You have a leaderboard on your screen with scores of everyone in this io battle, so you always know which hexar you can swallow and which black hole will eliminate you. Share this game with your friends and compete together in our multiplayer battle. Hit the top of the leaderboard and eliminate your friends to show them that your hexar is able to swallow everything on its way. 

Take full control of this power and destroy as many things as possible, grow from an EF2, EF3, EF4 until you become a gigantic EF5 tornado that eats up buildings, trees, cars, barns and anything else unlucky enough to be in its path! 


Tornado.io! is a free to play io simulator of hexar battle. Grow your black hole as fast as you can by engulfing parts of the city and take part in a great io competition where only the biggest black hole will win. Earn as many points as you can to become the leader of the scoreboard in this battle and start dominating in this multiplayer battle. Playing with your friends have never been so easy and fun, just connect to one battle and compete in swallowing each other. This io simulator is a great way to spend some of your free time in joy. Download Tornado.io and prepare to become part of greatest io battle ever.

title: Angry Trump And Putin,Play game now
description:
Angry Trump And Putin,Play game to get Award up to $9,000.

Getting Over It With Trump And Putin : have to climb hiking map from the bottom and take your place at the top of the game.

This is a version stupid and crazy game for getting over mountain. 
Your will character is trump, who have to getting over climb up the obstructions from mountain. Trump will lead to the heights top the mountain, so sturdy with a hammer with this, to put it mildly. Trump will definitely getting over and reach unprecedented heights.

The game play seems pretty simple. Trump with a hammer, which can push off from the ground and cling to the protrusions, climbing higher and higher. From the first seconds of the game you will realize that the mechanics of the game are incredibly complex and require tremendous effort. One mistake - and you surely fall to the bottom and have to start all over again. The game world also looks insanely - you will climb over the obstructions of the most ordinary household items interspersed with trees and dilapidated buildings. Your valiant chopper though has a cauldron instead of the lower extremities, climbs up and getting over quite confidently, without losing self-control after numerous failures.


Features:

- You can choose character to getting over mountain with trump or you can play version game trump getting over climbing .
- Climb up an enormous mountain with nothing but a hammer and a pot.
- The game is different level (although there are no guarantees that you will ever manage to getting over and pass mountain)
- Unpredictable physics of the game, allowing you to overcome obstacles in an incredible way
- The goal of the game is to conquer the more than hight mountain (yes, it is so high you need to climb)
- Hiking map different.
- The means of transport is a sledgehammer
Trumps swings it back and forth, clings it to the stones, hiking, littering the slopes of the mountain, and makes funny jumps, and thus moves up the slope. It all looks very funny. 

We will update map in the future with diffirently level .
Enjoy play game getting over mountain with trump.

title: Subway Boy Run
description:
Super crazy running game, Subway Boy Run as fast as you can! Subway Boy is an amazing running game on subway for runner. Run along the chaos complex traffic subway and escape from the monster.
-----------------------
Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now,surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Subway Boy Run must be a very fun run game. Download it now and start your Subway Boy Run and forest surfers, join the most thrilling dash.
-----------------------
Subway Boy Run Features:
- New subway scene,wonderful underground city and forest.
- Thrilling moment, death speed
- A variety of role selection, a variety of unique skills
- Easy and smooth operation

How to play Subway Boy Run:

- When you are pursued by a security guard / ranger, you must run and stay away from the security guard, when you run, you will find many challenges that can make you fail to succeed in playing the Subway Boy Run.
- In the game there will be many useful items for you, such as: rocket to fly, skateboard, jumping boots, and others.
- When you run, you must collect gold coins, the coin is useful to buy characters and items in the Subway Boy.

title: No Touching! poney 2 2018
description:
No Touching! poney 2 2018

Just move the touch left and right to give the pony a little poke.
You can also click one of the icons on the top of the screen to switch to a different character.

Here is the list of all the ponies you can find in "No Touching": 


Princess Luna, Queen Chrysalis, Trixie, Lyra, Derpy, Big Mac, Rarity, Discord, Nightmare Moon, Cadance, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy (Flutterbat at 8 pokes), Princess Celestia, Fluffle Puff, Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Octavia, Vinyl, Sombra, Sunset Shimmer, Gilda, Berry Punch, Mane-iac, Shining Armor, Spike, Apple Bloom, Scootaloo, Sweetie Belle, Babs Seed, Zecora, Doctor Whooves, Minuette, Bon Bon, Spitfire, Marble Pie, Maud Pie, Golden Harvest, Apple Fritter, Flash Sentry, Silver Spoon, Diamond Tiara, Cloudchaser, Flitter, Royal Guard, Fausticorn.

title: Ultraman Rumble3
description:
Prepare for epic action-fighting with your favorite Ultraman Brothers and Monster in the ultimate rumble battle showdown! UltraSeven, Ultraman Taro, Father of Ultra & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & challenge with others to become the Ultimate Team of the Galaxy

WELCOME TO ULTRAMAN RUMBLE 3:
Ultraman  Rumble 3 offers you an action team fighting style. Collect your favorite characters, special moves, and team them up in the way YOU like it. Be strong and graceful with Seven & Taro, fast and shattering with Jack & Ace, badass and deadly with Gomora & Zetton.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:
• Assemble a mighty team of Ultraman Brothers and Monsters (choosing characters such as: Ultraman, UltraSeven, Ultraman Taro, Ultraman  Ace, Father of Ultra, Gomora,  Baltan,  Zetton, Red King)
• Improve your team’s offense and defense with multiple Special moves such as Specium Beam, Ultra Dynamite, Jack Deadly  Uppercut, Gomora Charge, Baltan Illusions.


COLLECT AND CHALLENGE: 
• Collect, level up, and manage your teams of Ultraman Brothers and Monsters & send your team to challenge other player. 
• Climb the ranked ladder. Be the top team of the galaxy.

The Slug Tower Defense, our tower is in great danger which we’ve never faced! Not only ghouls, but also goblins, spirits, zombies and other monster are trying to destroy us! Build your defense and stop them now Slug Tower Defense!

title: Risky Road Rider : Extreme Car Bridge Driving
description:
Risky rider is an amazing simple physics based racing game with lots of challenges. It is specially designed for people looking for some real entertainment and fun. 

Take your driving to new heights! Be a master and unlock addicting levels and vehicles. 

The game is challenging with curve bridges, ladder, risky roads and loops, posed to the user on his journey.

The rider has to perform some breath-taking stunts facing those obstacles like loops and curves and gives the rider, a mountain racing feel. 

How to play risky road rider
- Just tap the screen to accelerate and pass obstacles.
- Reach the finish point.
- Collect coins to unlock new vehicles.
- Tap and hold to accelerate, and to slow down just release the tap.
- Unlock more levels and share your leaderboard with your friends.
- Once the rider falls down, the level will be considered as failed.

Risky Road Rider is one of the best racing games. Download this risky road rider app if you are really looking for some entertainment.

title: Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter
description:
Lets Play Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter



Once you start playing Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter, you will not stop playing. 
Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter is an addictive puzzle game to relax your brain.
Play it with your family and share to friends. Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter is suitable for all ages.
No matter child or elderly love Bubble Pop Classic. 
Are you ready to play Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter game? Let’s find keys from the bubbles by shooting. 
Warm up your fingers and tap on the bubble above. Then find your target. 
Match and pop three or more bubbles of the same color. Lift your finger to have a shoot. 
Drop 10 balls or more to get a BOMB to the surrounding bubbles. Collect enough keys can unlock next level. 

Its Identical to Snow Bros

The game that was sensationally popular in the 90s is back.
With many loves from worldwide gamers, Snow Bros has become a remake and been launched.
Optimized into the Smartphone environment, anyone can easily enjoy and play.
You play out the game more than 50 stages by defeating about 20 kinds of monsters.
Also you can compete with other players in leaderboards and achievements through acquiring items, clearing stages, 
and raising the all-kill points.
Now! Let’s create the snowballs, defeat the monsters, and save the princess!
If you delay, the pumpkin ghost will appear and harass you. So be careful! 

If You are Looking For your 2D Childhood Games Like Snow Bros, Metal Slug, Pang bubble, Bubble King , Shoot Bubble ,ludo Star , ludo King , Bubble Bobble,
School Bubble, Bubble Pop Classic, or Subway Surfer, 8 Ball pool, candy Crush Saga, power pop bubble, tample run or talking tom, 
carrom carum, caroom,babble,bibble,bubble,best games, pubg! or whatever its speel is than 
Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter is the Perfect Game For you.

Share Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter game with your friends through wifi , whatsappp, messenger, 
facebookk,Instagramm, Musicalyy or whatever app you prefer.

Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter like it was back in the 80’s! Get ready to burst bubbles like you did in the childhood, 
now on your smartphone. So have the experience of old school game console now on your modern smartphone device.
Classic Bubble Bobble: Pang Snow Bubble Shooter is a 1986 arcade puzzle game that brings the old comical action back to your Android phone. 
This addicting bubble shooter game features two bubble dragons Bob and Bub who shoot and jump over bubbles 
to avoid traps and navigate their way through obstacles in over 1000 levels of the game! This bubble buster game is full 
of rainbow surprises, rewards, and bonuses that help you in the play to reach higher stages.
The gameplay is simple; you start out as either of Bob and Bub who shoot bubbles at their enemies and use the on screen 
buttons to either jump over them or let them burst on their own and reach higher levels. 
The game will often reward you with special candies and rainbows that will allow you to excel further in-game.
 With a neat, retro gaming interface, this game brings you back the thrill of old games.
This game is sure to take you to a nostalgic adventure and awaken the bubble buster inside you.
 Now turn the fun mode on and tap to pop it up in this boredom killing app!
• 1000+ stages to complete!
• Throw bubbles and burst them to defeat enemies
• In-game rewards and bonuses
• Simple, retro gaming interface
• Timeless classic
• Have the experience of an old console on mobile
• The game is free with unlimited play
• Touch buttons provide an easy and smooth gameplay

title: Circus Charlie
description:
Player's role is a clown. Player must finish 5 stage.
Stage 1: Player ride lion and jump over the fire circus
Stage 2: Player walk on rope and jump over monkeys
Stage 3: Player stand on ball and jump over another ball
Stage 4: Player ride horse and jump on spring
Stage 5: Player hold rope and jump over ropes.
Game has two mode. The classic mode, you play from stage 1 to stage 5. The challenge mode, you choose a stage and play unlimited time.

title: Pitfaller Retro
description:
This masterpiece was the console's first side-scroller, moving your character left or right as you traversed the jungle filled with gator-infested swamps, treasure, and the occasional other pitfalls. 

The second-best selling game for the 2600, Pitfaller (1982) sold four million copies. It was totally original and deserving of its place in history.

title: Jelly Slice
description:
Jelly Slicer is a unique puzzle game in which you need to find the best way to divide a set of shapes to collect the fruit.

There is only ONE RULE: Cut the shape so that each slice contains only one fruit!

Sounds easy? You will need a fair amount of imagination, logic and visual skills to progress through the levels. Get a slice of brain workout through 120 original levels presented with high definition graphics.

title: Space Shooter: Galaxy Invaders
description:
Our galaxy is under alien invasion. The evil alien spaceships are on mission to destroy our galactic neighborhood. Swarms of spacecrafts are approaching to hunt, attack and destroy us. Hurry to your ship, Fighter!

Take command of Powerupful Ships and fight the battle to repel these evil space invaders. Fly your jet powered machine and traverse the vastness of our galaxy. Counter various opponenets and Boss, and shoot them down. 

Galaxy under Fire is an Arcade / Action Shooter game. Earn resources by shooting down enemies and use them to purchase more powerful ships and spacecrafts. Upgrades your weapons and unleash havoc in this clash of space civilizations. 

Traverse through asteriods, planets and moon, and defend the vastness of our solar system and beyond. Resist the space attack and protect your galaxy from total anhilation.

Collect powerups and rule the sky in this space arcade shooter game. Lead with your plane in this space warefare and Shoot down the invading spaceships. 

 Features: 
◉ Challenging levels with realistic backgrounds including space, planets, moons, stars, nebulas and galaxies.
◉ Powerful ships with destructive and upgradable weapons to attack space invaders.
◉ Variety of enemy spacecrafts, ships and bosses.
◉ Earn coins by attacking enemy and completing achievements and use them upgrade your ships.
◉ Collect amazing power-ups to boost your performance during tough situations.

* Be careful to not let the jumping ball hit the red planks in the helix maze or it's game over!

Features:
• Simple and classic game that you can play anywhere.
• Colorful graphic.
• Multiple levels of helix ball jump box
• Easy game to play with one-touch controls
• Beautiful helix tower labyrinth graphics
• Thrilling and fun running helix ball jump adventure
• Frenzied, addicting and fast game experience
• Great music and intense sound effects helix ball jump

Play and share Helix Ball - Jumping Ball Tower Game with your friends and families now.

title: Rip ‘Em A New One
description:
Command an elite squad of commandos in this action packed retro shooter game. Upgrade your devastating arsenal of weapons, recruit iconic commandos, and attack the enemy in fierce, epic battles. 

Unlock new campaigns as you shoot your way through thrilling situation after another to save the world from the enemy’s evil plan to turn everyone into mindless, zombie like hordes. If the enemy is not stopped soon, the world as we know it will be no more. You have been chosen to lead the ultimate commando squad across the global to rescue your comrades, wipe out all of the enemy's bases, and kill everyone else you encounter!

Lock and load soldier, it's time to roll! 

Still need convincing private? Checkout these features!

UNIQUE CAMPAIGNS
Each campaign has a unique theme including deadly jungles, frozen arctic tundra, and scorching desert wastelands.

UNLOCK ICON COMMANDOS
Recruit special commandos to add them to your squad which you can use on future missions.

DESTRUCTIBLE LEVELS
Do you love explosions? Awesome, so do we! You can blow up all sorts of stuff on the missions. Want to see what a rocket launcher does to a palm tree or a grenade to tank? The power is in your hands, or should we say weapon?

TONS OF ENEMY VEHICLES TO DESTROY
Tanks, sniper towers, gunboats, snowmobiles, and attack helicopters to name a few. If you can dream it, you can destroy it!

BIG BAD BOSSES GALORE
The game is full of tough, big bad bosses including:
- The Rocket Brothers who are twin brothers who both wield multishot rocket launchers!
- Killer Yeti Warriors who will stop at nothing to eat you.
- Giant, genetically engineered alligators - need we say more?
- Corpus Natas an evil cult leader who is on a quest for immortality..

Good luck commando!

title: South Park: Angry Eric
description:
Cartman is angry, he decides to take out his anger at some boxes on a floating platform.
Use the slingshot to help Eric bring down the boxes. Hit the boxes hardly enough with Eric's
angry head to knock them down.
This southpark app is not made by the show owners. It is made by the fans for the fans.
This app features physics-based game-play, each level requires good reasoning and logical skills to solve it.

title: Super Soldier Squad: Classic Game Evolution
description:
A Super shooting game which is very hot in classic-8-bit of 80's & 90's, now play for free on Android with new name is Super Soldier Squad. So, Do you remember old name of this game? I'll suggest for you, start with Super C... Can you guess?

SOME SPECIAL SUGGESTIONS FOR YOU:

=> This game with name is start with Super C... which is very famous game. It had many versions. The old classic one had nine stages. There are three lives that you can utilize to complete all the stages. We also used a cheat code from which that increased the count of life from three to thirty.

=> Super Soldier Squad: Classic Game Evolution is a best shooting game on 80's, a Super old game for you!!! It bring many many feeling from childhood when you are played on the NES's hardware, and takes you back to the good old days.

=>  The soldier's default weapon is a rifle with unlimited ammunition that can be upgraded into one of four other guns. These can be obtained by destroying the pill box sensors and flying item capsules containing them, or by defeating the red-clad guards in the enemy bases. They consist of a machine gun that fires rapidly when the fire button is held down, a laser gun that shoots a powerful beam, a fireball gun that shoots its rounds in a corkscrew pattern, and a spread gun that shoots five individual bullets in individual directions. There are also three auxiliary power-ups that only appear in certain areas when the player is armed with his default gun: a rapid bullets upgrade that increases the firing speed of the player's shots, a barrier that makes him invulnerable for a limited period, and a bomb that wipes out all onscreen enemies. With the exception of the machine gun and the laser gun, each item comes in the form of a Falcon-shaped symbol marked with a letter representing its function

=> A super soldier employs a variety of playing perspectives, which include a standard side view, a pseudo-3D view (in which the player proceeds by shooting and moving towards the background, in addition to left or right) and a fixed screen format (in which the player has their gun aimed upwards by default). The controls consists of an eight-way joystick or directional pad and two action buttons for shooting (left) and jumping (right). When one of the protagonists jumps, he curls into a somersault instead of doing a conventional jump like in other games.

Blow up all enemies in Super Soldier Squad! Kill them all in this amazing shooter game. Please hold your arms up and face dangerous challenges ahead.


****** FEATURE of Super Soldier Squad: Classic Game Evolution ******

★ Very amazing gameplay
★ Smooth Control
★ Beautiful Graphics (HD graphics)
★ Very very interesting sounds from your childhood.

****** HOW TO PLAY Super Soldier Squad: Classic Game Evolution ******

★ Use the joypad to move
★ Tap Jump button to jump avoid obstacles
★ Tap fire button to shoot

Download Super Soldier Squad: Classic Game Evolution now and let the shooting begin!

title: Bounce Up : Forever Jumpy - Road To The Sky
description:
Bounce Up is an addictive casual game that you can learn how to play easy and master just in seconds of playing.
You can play forever to get as high as you can. Just tap to make the ball jump into another platform. 
However, don't be fooled. It's not easy as you think. The higher, the more dangerous. 
Just be careful in every step you make because you have only 1 chance.

*How to play:
- Tap to jump
- Get as high as you can.

Have fun!

title: Gold Miner: Undersea 2
description:
Gold Miner: Undersea 2 is the #1 mobile version of your favorite classic gold rush game but provides a wilder experience than you've ever played before. This game is a gold mine really, each level is a gold mine, with several kind of gold and diamond. Your mission is get all the gold using the hook on the boat. In this game you can see many type of gold : fish and diamond, diamonds and jewelery gems or the golds. But it's not easy for the gold rush, because of the baricades, like tnt bomb, rock and the moving fishes, so keep calm and be concentrate on the hook and got the best score for you.

Gold miner is impossible to know the exact date that humans first began to mine gold, but this game will take you to an exciting, historical adventure entirely rethought to fit the Touch experience of your Android phone. You can not find this idea in any gold mine game free on store. We have a small compare with the others like gold miner mania, our game has game graphics better, with tiny miner our game has the huge level system. And don't talk about gold miner world after play this game, with gold miner pirates, our game is the pirate of ocean because we start the gold rush. For sample, you must collect enough stone quest, diamond quest, jewel quest, ruby quest, golden egg shoot or more other greatest games. 

In this Gold miner , you have to direct your little crank to haul in gold nuggets. Every stage will have a coins goal that you must achieve. If the gold you've collected adds up to your goal then you move on to the next stage. Gold, diamond, dynamite, TNT bom and lucky clover? crafting, mining games? minemaps? You are a good goldminer now and it's your job to mine gold and come out with full mine pocket.
How to play Gold Miner: Undersea 2: - Your claw will swing back and forth. Tap black button on the screen to release the claw to grab gold and diamond. - Between stages you can buy items that can help you in the next stage.  
Game Features - Gold Miner 
- More 100 levels for you, look like a - kitco - of this game. 
- Good & cool graphics, the awesome gold rush ever. 
- Good Sound and Music. 
- You can play this game with friend on a phone. (Multiplayer mode) - Better than gold miner classic. 
- Sometime you see this game so better then gold miner vegas and gold miner clicker... - .... Wow, Gold Miner the classic gold miner game of california is so good, right?

title: Prince Of Persia 2
description:
Prince of Persia is a fantasy platform game, originally developed by Jordan Mechner and released in 1989, that represented a great leap forward in the quality of animation seen in video games. After the original release, Prince of Persia was ported to a wide range of platforms. 

In this game you will become a young prince which wants to save the princess from the evil sultan. You will need to go through treacherous levels to free the princess.

This game is a 2D platformer that is commonly regarded as a progenitor of the cinematic platform genre. Rather than following the more common jump-and-run mechanics, it focuses on careful advancement through fairly complex levels, emphasizing the protagonist’s vulnerability and survival aspect. Rotoscoping technique is used to give more realism to the animation of the characters’ movements.

Save the game whenever you want and continue from where you left even if you are out of lives. This capability will provide you to finish the overall game!

title: Fast Blast
description:
Think you are fast? Test yourself in Fast Blast, a super fun blast game! Think fast, and join the tile matching game adventure. Tap and explode blocks, and beware - you will quickly find this game addicting, and you just won't stop playing! Compete with family and friends and see who gets the highest score in the block puzzle race! 

Are you ready to speed up for the blast? Here it goes - tap 2 or more racing bricks and complete the challenges of each level. Try out this addicting blaster puzzle game and become the ultimate Tap 2 champion! Become part of the super quick racers, tap the tiles, and join the fast-paced race. Click on any 2 or more adjacent cubes of the same color to blast. The more blocks you pop, the higher score you will get. 

This is a fun and challenging cube game for families to play and enjoy. Tap and explode colorful cubes, and get ready to unlock hundreds of exciting levels full of bombs and blocks. The more cubes you pop and explode at one move, the better the chance you’ll unlock a cool booster that will help you defeat the obstacles. Speed up and test your turbo game racing skills in this awesome free puzzle game, and master the challenges.

HOW TO PLAY THIS BLASTER TAPPING GAME:
- Smash and Click on any 2 adjacent bricks of the same color to blast.
- Play through hundreds of fun game race levels.
- Overcome obstacles and achieve high scores to get addicting cool gifts.
- Clear the challenging blasting levels and advance along the map.
- Complete the mission each new level presents. 
- Plan your moves and clear the tile game board! 

Play this cool blast game everywhere and anywhere you’d like- no wifi is required. Get this awesome block puzzle game today for free, crush the bricks and win!

FAST BLAST AMAZING FEATURES:
- Colorful, quick racing adventure graphics and designs.
- Amazing turbo rush gameplay, tap the blocks to explode them in this fun blast game. 
- Smash and explode cubes in hundreds of exciting levels.
- Fun blasting boosters and bonuses!


COOL BOOSTS COMBOS
- Match and crush 5 or 6 tiles to get a rocket.
- Match and connect 7 or 8 cubes to get a bomb.
- Swipe and drag 9 cubes to earn a color wheel
- Combine and connect combo rush boosts to get bigger effects so that you can solve the super cool puzzle game in no time!

Do you dare to take the blasting game challenge and test your skills? 
Use the cool power-ups and boosts at the right time to clear the board and win awesome prizes and gifts in this cool arcade tapping Fast Blast game!

title: Spin Blade 2
description:
Spin Blade is definitely game you don't want to miss out, a couple of interesting things to discover and different exciting modes to try in spin 3D game and free spin. Depending on your level, you can unlock your super different spinning blade with a total highest Attacking power and sword & soul, hit point and speed and reaction time, you'll be able then to live a new adventure with several levels and exciting challenges, this is includes in the Arcade mode. Also, you can have the tournament mode or multiplayer mode. All of Spins Blade modes are enjoyable and addictive.

Spin Blade makes you besides all that, to improve your intelligence and reaction time. It keeps you concentrated and allows you to discover your abilities to manage multiple tasks in order to beat the player. This amazing arcade style game has colorful graphics and intelligent game play that match all ages , children, teens and adults, young and old. More over ,the great music goes along with your playing and keeps you motivated to win the fight !

3 Available Modes :

ARCADE : Play against the computer.

TOURNAMENT : Play through different levels with different players. once you win a fight, you must be ready to face another one in order to be the winner of the tournament.

MULTIPLAYER : Allows you to play with your paired devices , so fun and challenging!

In all modes, the fight ends in 100 seconds. Your score get higher or lower depending on your attacks and speed. If you hit your opponent , the score increases , if you get attacked , it becomes low. Try to earn points by using the attacking power. You can stop and replay the game at any time, also enable or disable music and sound. All options are offered in Spin Blade, to make you comfortable and satisfied while playing.

title: Bounce It - How High Can You Jump?
description:
Tap & hold to slide the bouncing ball platform to the right to be ready to catch the ball as it hops and bounces in just the right place.
Catch the ball as it hops and bounces in the center of the jumping ball platform, and watch it jump higher and higher as you gain extra points. 
Catch the ball as it hops, jumps and bounces on the platform edge, and watch a piece fall off. Another center jump hit for the bouncing ball will make the platform bigger again. 
And if you don't catch the ball when it jumps at all? Well, then you and your bouncing ball are pretty much screwed. 

Ready to bounce it? Hop to it!

Crazy Labs is a casual games brand, under which TabTale develops and publishes fun and addictive games. Crazy Labs partners with independent development studios across the globe to create engaging mobile content for audiences of all ages.

title: Gravity Helix
description:
FLIP GRAVITY WITH A TAP! Can you become the Gravity Master?

Enter a brand-new gravity-controlled adventure through a labyrinth tower in Gravity Helix. Avoid pitfalls, spikes and drops in a fresh take in the ball puzzler genre!


KEEP ROLLIN’, ROLLIN’, ROLLIN’
Control the ball on an endless journey up the spiralling helix. Once you start rolling, there’s no way to stop!

TOP TO BOTTOM
Use the gravity control to flip the fast-moving ball from floor to ceiling to avoid the hazards – racking up more points with every spin!

BOOST YOUR WAY TO THE LEADERBOARDS
Boost up the helix and dodge obstacles with lightning-fast reflexes to compete against your friends and solidify your position as a chart-topping champion!

PLAY IT YOUR WAY
Collect Gems and Letters while playing to give the game a new look, from balls to surroundings, constantly providing a new way to play!

NO MORE ADS? UNLOCK THE FULL GAME WITH A ONE-TIME PURCHASE
Play and enjoy the game entirely with in-game ads or buy the full game to never see them again.

JOIN THE FULL FAT COMMUNITY

 you need to escape to escape,

 in this free atmospheric horror game, never play alone!! you will

You have to look for the keys of the main

 homeroom, checking in the drawers and cupboards without making any sound in the horror mansion!

Unload mental stress and experience the beauty of life.

title: Hungry Dragon™
description:
Unleash fiery fury from above in Hungry Dragon, a fun and frantic action-arcade rampage where everything and everyone is on the menu! Control ferocious dragons, flying, burning and devouring your way through a medieval realm packed with deliciously unsuspecting prey!

***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.3 or above***

RELEASE THE DRAGONS
• Collect ferocious, fire-breathing Dragons, each unique in their own way

• Equip exotic Pets to boost your burning and biting power
• Level up by feasting on tasty townsfolk and other delicious prey

FEEDING FRENZY

descriptionHTML:
The Jungle King is game with awesome adventure in wild jungle and also is the one of the best arcade games.

Join your hero monkey help him to survive in wild and dangerous jungle. There are many challenges waiting for him : savages, spiders, fountains, bouncing flowers, and so on.
Do your best - jump, run and fight to be the king of jungle.

The Jungle King features:


- Awesome and naturally realistic graphics and music;

- The special lovely monkey;

- Challenges in different levels and even more upcoming soon;

- Various of enemies and monsters of the level non-standard obstacles;

- Many parts of the JUNGLE, Mushroom Forest, Water world and others.

How to play Game:
- Tap 'left' 'right' 'down' button to move monkey;
- Tap 'Jump' button to jump, double tap to jump higher;
- Tap 'Fight' button to defeat all enemies;
- Tap 'Fire' button to shoot;
- Finish perfect all levels.

Cool! Now you are ready download The Jungle King!
Hope you will enjoy our awesome adventure game!!!

title: Spin Blade
description:
Spin Blade is definitely Beyblade game you don't want to miss out, a couple of interesting things to discover and different exciting modes to try in spin 3D game and free spin. Depending on your level, you can unlock your super different spinning blade with a total highest Attacking power and sword & soul, hit point and speed and reaction time, you'll be able then to live a new adventure with several levels and exciting challenges, this is includes in the Arcade mode. Also, you can have the tournament mode or multiplayer mode. All of Spins Blade modes are enjoyable and addictive.

Spin Blade makes you besides all that, to improve your intelligence and reaction time. It keeps you concentrated and allows you to discover your abilities to manage multiple tasks in order to beat the player. This amazing arcade style game has colorful graphics and intelligent game play that match all ages , children, teens and adults, young and old. More over ,the great music goes along with your playing and keeps you motivated to win the fight !

3 Available Modes :

ARCADE : Play against the computer.

TOURNAMENT : Play through different levels with different players. once you win a fight, you must be ready to face another one in order to be the winner of the tournament.

MULTIPLAYER : Allows you to play with your paired devices , so fun and challenging!

In all modes, the fight ends in 100 seconds. Your score get higher or lower depending on your attacks and speed. If you hit your opponent , the score increases , if you get attacked , it becomes low. Try to earn points by using the attacking power. You can stop and replay the game at any time, also enable or disable music and sound. All options are offered in Spin Blade, to make you comfortable and satisfied while playing.

title: Willy Crash - Free Arcade Ragdoll Game
description:
Can losing be as much fun as winning? It just might be with Willy Crash!

Help Willy become the world's greatest stuntman. Launch him out of a cannon and aim for the tops of buildings to score big. Miss, and he will hilariously crash into a number of cringe-worthy, interactive obstacles. Play the FREE app version of the arcade game and start the fun today!

The more accurate your aim, the more coins you earn. Cash in your coins on unique outfits for Willy that increase stamina and keep him safer, longer. Choose from fun themes and make Willy look like a roughed-up royal, a crushed caveman, or a bruised biker. If the doctor tells him he needs to rest, cash in your Stunt Bucks for medicine to get Willy back in the cannon faster!

• Have a blast with the app version of the popular arcade game!
• Simple, addictive game-play
• Earn coins to buy funny outfits and increase your protection level, lengthening game-play
• Comedic crashing makes losing fun!

title: Treasure Match 3
description:
treasure match 3

Match the ancient gems, unlock magical boosters and find the lost treasure! Download and play this cool free game and join the fun match-3 puzzle adventure.
treasure match 3 offers beautiful graphics, awesome effects and plenty of challenging puzzles.

Solve the fun puzzles
Each level presents a new mission that you’ll have to complete. Try to use fewer moves to clear a level, so you can get higher score and get the chance to earn 3 stars.
Master the challenges to level up and win points!
Swap and match the treasure and collect gems in this addictive and fun match-3 online game. Available now for FREE on Android, no internet connection is required and there is no life limit, so you can play as much as you want!

Discover hundreds of addicting levels!
Some of the levels and match-3 puzzles can be difficult and you’ll want to use some special power-ups to boost your gaming performance. You can get these special bonuses by making the following combinations:
- Match 4 gems to get a striped treat of the same color and create a line blast.
- Match 5 items in an L or T form to get a special bomb that will explode all items around it.
- Match 5 jewels in a row to get a special colorful rainbow item. The colorful item can burst all gems with the same color.
- Connect 2 special boosters to create even greater explosions.

title: Talking Tom Jump Up
description:
From the makers of the popular Talking Tom and Friends games comes this new game packed with arcade jumping action.

Simply drag your finger on the screen to launch Talking Tom from trampoline to trampoline. Tom’s flappy little ears wiggle with excitement as he flies through the air. He just wants to jump again and again!

Collect Stars and spend them on new characters (including Talking Angela, Talking Ben and Talking Ginger), new costumes, new balls and new game worlds.

The higher you jump, the bigger your score. Can you get the best top score? There’s only one way to find out - download now and start playing for free!

Talking Tom Jump Up is currently only available in English.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

title: Boom Blast
description:
Download and play Boom Blast -  the most fun and exciting tap 2 game! Solve puzzles in this fun blasting game, clear all the levels, and win cool boosters. Play now for free and enjoy loads of challenging levels! Swipe and match 2 or more adjacent cubes to complete missions and clear levels. Create powerful combos to get awesome gifts and to explode all the blocks! 

Boom Blast crush game is the most fun and addicting arcade matching game in the store! Be the ultimate bomber, swap and match your way - tap the crush cubes and BOOM - create a major explosion! It's a great booming cube game for all of you who love to explode and pop for fun. Join the color blasting adventure and have a blast crushing and bursting all the colorful bricks! 

Try to clear the board with fewer moves to get a higher score. Remember, the more blocks you pop and burst, the higher score you will get! You can restart any level without having to wait for lives, as they are unlimited. Enjoy playing and solving all the fun arcade puzzles!

Play Boom Blast game, and enjoy the best puzzle block crush game features:
- Tap to play! Connect 2 or more adjacent tiles and bricks of the same color to create a cube blast. 
- Plenty of fun levels filled with cool puzzles and challenges that will train your brain. 
- Beautiful toys graphics and colorful designs. 
- Amazing boosts and gifts that will help you along the way.
- Easy to learn and play - crush toys and clear the board to advance! 
- Free tapping game to play and totally addictive!
- Awesome and relaxing blaster game to play with family and friends.

** Unlock awesome rewards and boosters that will create a big BOOM:
- Match, crush and burst 5 or 6 blocks to get a rocket.
- Crash, match and explode 7 or 8 tiles to get a bomb.
- Swipe, swap, and match 9 toy cubes to earn a color wheel
Rockets, bombs and color wheels will help you smash the blocks and beat the challenges! 

Fan of puzzle games? Can’t get enough of exciting brain teasers? Then Boom Blast tap game is simply perfect for you! Be the best bomber and blaster, get it now for free and test your puzzle solving skills with hours of block blasting fun! 

Can tapping 2 or more toy bricks get even more fun? 
Play this cool cube blast game now and find out!

title: THE PURGE AR
description:
The Purge is coming. Will you hide? Or will you seek?

Prepare for The Purge with The Purge: AR app and defend your home against ruthless Purge Night attacks. Unlock up to 30 objects— including panic rooms, barbed wire and bear traps— customize them to fit your walls and ceiling and use them to fortify your home. Then, put your defenses to the test and see if you have what it takes to survive Purge Night. As you clear increasingly difficult stages, you will get rewarded with additional objects to safeguard your home. Don’t forget to snap pics of your defenses and share them with friends!

The Purge: AR Features:
-Choose from over 30 AR objects and customize them to fit your room 
-Test how well your defenses hold up on Purge Night and see the results with custom animations
-Clear increasingly difficult stages and see how many Purge Nights you can survive
-Share images of your fortified home with friends
-Get rewarded for surviving The Purge with exclusive content

For the best experience, The Purge: AR requires an ARCore supported device.

THE PURGE Premieres September 4 at 10/9c on USA Network with the premiere and finale episodes simulcast on SYFY.

Based on the hit movie franchise from Blumhouse Productions, The Purge revolves around a 12-hour period when all crime, including murder, is legal. Set in an altered America ruled by a totalitarian political party, the series follows several seemingly unrelated characters living in a small city. As the clock winds down, each character is forced to reckon with their past as they discover how far they will go to survive the night.

The Purge is written and executive produced by the film franchise creator James DeMonaco and led by Jason Blum. Additionally, the entire team behind the blockbuster franchise ‎are on board to executive produce: Michael Bay with Brad Fuller and Andrew Form under the Platinum Dunes banner and Sebastien K. Lemercier. Thomas Kelly serves as executive producer/showrunner of the series. Emmy® and Golden Globe® award-winner Anthony Hemingway will direct and executive produce the premiere episode.

description:
The Big Race: Blaze Vs Monster Machines
Start blazing with your monster machines truck and begin your Blaze adventure 

The Big Race: Blaze Vs Monster Machines game brings your racing games fantasies come to life right before your eyes
Monster machines games are always the best, it's fun to play and to watch because it's very cool and all the players love it. but not all the monster machines games are cool and enjoyable, there is a lot of blaze games that are just normal and less funny so i doesn't make you live the full experience. this why we put our efforts together and work hard to bring to you the best monster machines games you will play by far. In this blaze game you will test your driving skills and also you ability to survive in the amazing racing tracks. To select the locked monster machines Collect the coins to unlock them, don't forget to pick all the coins

Start racing against monster machines right away in The Snowy Slopes, Badlands, or The Monster Dome!
The Monster Machines are lighting up their trucks as they use the power of reflection to illuminate the track!
Challenge your friends and family in this blazing game, where you can race with them and select your own vehicles like blaze dino, blaze dragon,Pickle and Gasquatch, PegWheel PETE and much more shin boy blazing monster machines. title: Double Bobble: Bub and Bob
description:
An exciting adventure combine classic shooting bubble of double tiwn dragons.

One of the top classic arcade games with 100 levels of hopping, bubble-filled fun.
The controls are simple. Spit a bubble and jump. You can also jump on the spit bubbles by mashing jump or jump at/fall through them to break them.
Sound is iconic at this point and overall enjoyable.
Gameplay is relatively simple where the goal of the game is to trap the enemies in bubbles and pop them on each level, avoiding damage, figuring out the puzzle, and grabbing powerups or special items along the way.

You control a dragon that shoots bubbles from its mouth.  You can capture monsters in the bubbles who then float around the screen in the bubble.  You have to jump on the bubble to pop it with the monster in it who then turns into a piece of fruit that falls to the floor.  If you wait too long the bubble will turn red and the monster will come back angry and fast.  If you wait too long to complete the stage, a skeletal shark appears and hunts you down.  You can't avoid him and if you don't beat the stage before he hits you, you lose a life.  Once all the monsters on the stage are popped, you proceed to the next stage.

Let play with 2 dragons now !

description:
You are jojo siwa fans, you should try siwa jojo dolls. on this game you can play and have fan with your favorite jojo doll. it's so different, we are sure that you will love it.

Joelle Joanie "JoJo" Siwa is an American dancer, singer, actress, and YouTube personality. She is known for appearing for two seasons on Dance Moms along with her mother, Jessalynn Siwa, and for her singles "Boomerang" and "Kid in a Candy Store". Jojo Siwa posts daily activities through his YouTube channel.

jojo siwa, the young and charming uphill racer. she is about to embark on a journey that takes her to where no ride has ever been before. Join the adventure with siwa when climbing the highest hills up on sun!

Face the challenges of playing in environments with different jojo siwa dolls cars. Collect coins to unlock and buy different cars and reach to greater distances, but be aware the fuel can easily run out so keep your eye on that and collect fuel as much as you can in siwa jojo  dolls game.

***Game Features***:
- Smooth game control
- Multiple Characters Choice (3 Siwa Characters)
- Time Based Gameplay
- Endless Game
- Up To 50+ Levels
- Sound on/Off Option
- Classic car and truck game style
- Great graphics and sounds
- No purchase required
- Suitable for all ages

title: MAME Arcade - Super Emulator - Full Games
description:
Arcade Games Emulator supported by original MAME 0.139u1plus some additional games from newer MAME versions.

This version emulates over 2000 different romsets.

Please, try to understand that that with that amount of games, some will run better than others and some might not even run with MAME4droid.
Please, don't email me asking for a specific game to run.

Owners of older devices should not expect good performance. Tips to help performance: use lower quality sound or switch it off, use 8 bit depth, underclock the CPU and Sound CPUs. Disable stick and buttons animations and disable smooth scaling also.

After installing, place your MAME-titled zipped roms in /sdcard/ROMs/ArcadeEmu/roms folder.

Features
------------

Support for 2.1 and upper Android devices.
Native support for Android Honeycomb tablets.
Android 3.0 (Honeycomb) 2D Hardware Accelerated.
Autorotate.
HW Keys remapping.
Touch Controller can be shown/hidden.
Smooth image.
Overlay Filters, scalines, CRT..
Digital or Analog touch selectable.
Animated touch stick or DPAD.
Button Layout customizable control.
iON's iCade and iCP (as iCade mode) external controllers supported.
Wiimote support using WiiCrotroller Market app.
Tilt Sensor as left/right.
Local multiplayer.
1 to 6 buttons optionally shown.
Options for video aspect ratio, scaling, rotate.
Adjustable CPU, Audio clock.

CONTROLS
-----------

The emulator controls are the following ones:
- Virtual pad: Movement in pad, mouse and analog control of the four players.
- Buttons B,X,A,Y,L,R: Buttons A,B,C,D,E,F.
- Button SELECT (Coin): Insert credits (UP+SELECT = 2P credits, RIGHT+SELECT = 3P credits, DOWN+SELECT = 4P credits).
- Button START: start (UP+START = 2P start, RIGHT+START = 3P start, DOWN+START = 4P start).
- Buttons L2: Exit to selection menu to select another game.
- Buttons START+SELECT simultaneously: Access to the MAME menu.
- Button R2: Open help, global settings.

NOTE: To type OK when MAME requires it, press LEFT and then RIGHT.


INSTALLATION
---------------

After installing, place your MAME-titled zipped roms in /sdcard/ROMs/ArcadeEmu/roms folder.

cheat.dat -> Cheats definition file
hiscore.dat -> High Scores definition file
artwork/ -> Artwork directory
cfg/ -> MAME configuration files directory
frontend/ -> Frontend configuration files
hi/ -> High Scores directory
inp/ -> Game recordings directory
memcard/ -> Memory card files directory
nvram/ -> NVRAM files directory
roms/ -> ROMs directory
samples/ -> Samples directory
skins/ -> Frontend skins directory
snap/ -> Screen snapshots directory
sta/ -> Save states directory


SUPPORTED GAMES
------------------

There are 2270 different supported romsets.
Games have to be copied into the roms/ folder.


MAME4droid LICENSE
------------------

The MAME4droid project is released under the GPL license. In addition you have some extra rights granted by a special license exception which allow you to link the MAME4droid GPL source with the not GPL MAME source.

The exception also gives you the rights to eliminate it if you don't like it or if you want to include the MAME4droid source in another GPL program. So, MAME4droid is 100% GPL.

You can more easily think at it as a sort of double license. A GPL or a GPL + exception. You have all the rights of the GPL, and, if you want, some others.

The only limitation is for MAME4droid. MAME4droid cannot include external GPL source without the explicit permission of the source copyright holder.

sta/ -> Save states directory


SUPPORTED GAMES
------------------

There are 2270 different supported romsets.
Games have to be copied into the roms/ folder.


MAME4droid LICENSE
------------------

The MAME4droid project is released under the GPL license. In addition you have some extra rights granted by a special license exception which allow you to link the MAME4droid GPL source with the not GPL MAME source.

The exception also gives you the rights to eliminate it if you don't like it or if you want to include the MAME4droid source in another GPL program. So, MAME4droid is 100% GPL.

You can more easily think at it as a sort of double license. A GPL or a GPL + exception. You have all the rights of the GPL, and, if you want, some others.

The only limitation is for MAME4droid. MAME4droid cannot include external GPL source without the explicit permission of the source copyright holder.
summary: Arcade Games Emulator supported by original MAME 0.139u1

title: Climb or Die: Smash and Slash
description:
Climb or Die: Smash and Slash - free action game with awesome gameplay!

The aliens decided to take over the Earth and already occupied part of the buildings. With each floor, monsters are becoming more sophisticated, and the battle is hotter. The defenders are also strong and ready to strike back.
Climb or Die: Smash and Slash allows you to spend game currency on useful and necessary options: development of abilities and new equipment. Not simple swords and helmets are available to you, but improved models with additional fighting qualities.
Hero, Ninja or Worker - choose your character and go to storm the wall. Collect more gold than others, enter your name in list of records of the country or the whole world.
The mechanics of the game are based on climbing. Insidious monsters will interfere with you in every way, throwing on you bricks, garbage and even flower beds. Sometimes they can attack by themselves. Each floor brings more and more difficult challenges, but gives gold and raises your position in the ranking. The goal of the game is to climb as high as possible, and new, powerful equipment will help you.
The Hero can easily pass a large number of floors at a time thanks to the updated system of abilities and uniforms, but can fall victim of flower beds flying at him.

Use the new ammunition as efficiently as possible, choose the Ninja where you need a sharp sword to fight aliens, and the Worker and the helmet for protect from head injury. Correct alternation of characters will help to get maximum results.

title: Fruit Slash 2019
description:
Enjoy the summer with slashing fruit with knife. A brand new addition of casual game that's simple and provide original content with single tap control to manage Knife. 

You are presented with a single knife and fruits and moving fruits. Tap when the knife may hit the fruit. If you can cut multiple fruits with one hit, that will earn you a bonus. If the fruit drops on the floor, that will finish the game.

The game play is easy yet very engaging. It’s all about having fun and enjoyment and to learn it's not an easy task to be a one hit Fruit shooter!

What you waiting for? Download it now!

· Different fruit models.

title: Blue Ball 4 : In the Wild Jungle Adventures
description:
Blue Ball 4 : Blue Ball in the Wild Jungle Adventures
Blue Ball 4 is a classical running and jumping platform game, Blue Ball in the wild Jungle Adventures one of the best jungle running adventure games
This is a free game where the little blue ball and Red Ball has a mission, he must smash enemies to pass so many threats .Are you willing to help the litlle Blue Ball and Red Ball avoid dangers and collect mushrooms
In this Blue Ball Jump adventure game, the little Blue Ball and Red Ball has to run all the way in order to collect coins and power-ups to fight with the bosses.
Our little Blue Ball and Red Ball needs to run into the jungle and to swing through vines and take mushrooms
Roll, jump, and bounce through 80 exciting levels full of adventure
Are you ready? well if you are, this is a very easy game to play and free to download. Enjoy the Blue Ball Run adventures with the little Blue Ball and Red Ball.

How to Play:

> To move Blue Ball / Red Ball character click on right or left on the control pad
> Press Jump-button AND right or left for running
> Press B-button to make Blue Ball / Red Ball jump
> Click the down button to get it on some tree stumps in order to go to a bonus level!
> Blue Ball / Red Ball swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher

Best Features:
> Blue Ball 4 has a lot of levels
> 80 beautiful, well-designed and challening levels
> Free game without internet
> 5 different amazing worlds  with Jungle, Desert,Forest, Beach,Fire world.
> Amazing gameplay reminding us of retro classic games
> Many power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items
> The run adventure is a colorful game , Wonderful High-resolution Graphics
> Great photograph and lovely Blue Ball
> easy and free to play
> A lot of enemies with different difficulties

We hope all the users have a great time playing this new Blue Ball 4 adventure platformer game

Enjoy this brand new Blue Ball : Blue Ball in the Wild Jungle Adventures for free, Download Now and Enjoy the Wild Jungle Adventures!

title: Hunger.io- Bigger Blackhole
description:
Hunger.io has now brought the bigger black hole for eating bigger objects like houses, buildings, cars, people, and other things. Eat things in your path through the biggest black hole in the game world. Eat your enemies, super villains, and evil monsters through your biggest black hole of the eating city.
The eating city is filled with different objects to eat like signals, poles, cars, trucks, bikes, cycles, and even humans. This black hole game has a void hole which has to eat anything in its path. Participate in blackhole battlegrounds with your friends against your enemies. Eat different people on the different blackhole battlegrounds in the blackhole city.
Drag different matter objects in your bigger blackhole and increase your blackhole size. The bigger your black hole is, the more eating capacity you have. The famous blackhole has the biggest size in all the black holes of the eating world. Play blackhole battles and take part in amazing blackhole tournaments.
This is a live online multiplayer blackhole game in which you have to pull things towards your hungry black hole. You can also play offline this hunger.io game with AI players. The AI players are highly intelligent and skillful who give a tough competition. There are many trees to eat and benches to digest which help your black hole to increase its size.
Play this addictive blackhole game for endless game challenges. This circle controlling game has huge buildings, supercars, benches, grounds, trees, gardens, signals, and poles. The buildings are tall and the cars are super fast. Play this competitive game to eat various things and objects. Eat as many things as you can with your bigger black hole.
$$$ Hunger.io- Bigger Blackhole Features $$$
$ Eat Multiple Objects
$ Hungry Blackhole
$ Fierce Battles
$ Endless Blackhole
$ Speedy Cars
$ Bigger Buildings
$ Super Grand City
$ Colorful Cars, Colorful Buildings, Colorful Houses
Eat buildings, people, cars, and other items to survive and have a big black hole. Eat huge buildings and remove your hunger. Play with your friends, family, and enemies to defeat them all. There are colorful houses and colorful buildings in this fast-paced multiplayer blackhole game. There are also colorful cars, colorful bright houses, and other colorful vehicles. Download this action-arcade game now to experience the best black hole game and eat things.

title: Snake Balls Block
description:
Snake Balls Block  is a simple addictive and pleasurable bricks breaker & snake game, brings the free-to-play arcade game enjoyment for all of you. 

To Get High Score, hit as many bricks as possible, but make sure your snake length need larger than brick value to breakdown bricks. So for length of snake, you need to get balls with numbers.

How to play?
Hold the screen with your finger and move to aim.
Swipe the snake to the brick and destroy all the bricks.
If the length of the snake less than or equal to the value of the brick, bounce
If he length of the snake larger than the value of the brick, break it and continue on
Stop the bricks from reaching the ceiling or it's game over.

Game features:
√ More snakes skins! More Fun!
√ Easy to play. One finger controls.
√ Unlock new snakes with special skills!
√ Make a longer snake to strengthen attack power.
√ Over 1000 challenges, can play without internet connection.

Download for free today, relax your brain. Destroy as many bricks as you can.

title: Color Ball Switch 2019 - Color Change Game
description:
Are you looking for some colorful addictive game? Then this "Color Ball Switch 2019 - Color Change Game" is for you. Take your addiction level to some super extend and be part of the impossible switch color by color tap switch. It is addictive and challenging, go on Impossible Switch Color journey. Race at super speeds through an ever-changing color tunnel packed full of many finger stubbing obstacles including ballz and blocks. To pass each obstacle, you must match the color of your shape with the color that appears in the obstacle. Your color changes after each obstacle, depending on when you touch a certain color in this endless color ball switch and color ball wheel switch game. With each passed obstacle, you get a diamond that can be spent on upgrading to different shapes in the color ball match switch. Don't be twisted in this twisted color ball switch path just do color tap switch and complete the color ball switch challenge in endless color ball switch mode of the addictive color game.

"Color Ball Switch 2019 - Color Change Game" is one of the best color ball switch game. Become the addictive in the color ball match switch and color ball wheel switch from the impossible switch color. Pass through the wrong color and it's game over. Download Color ball Wheel Switch Today and enjoy the never-ending endless color ball switch. 

Features of "Color Ball Switch 2019 - Color Change Game" are:
1- Endless Color ball Switch Mode.

title: Retro Game Center (enjoy classic/emulation games)
description:
Discovery classic emulation games and play inside the same app!

Features:
- Emulation game database (Search/Rank/Filter)
- Built-in universal emulator (NES/SNES/GB/GBC/GBA/Genesis/MD/GG/32x/Arcade/etc)
- Zero configuration (link a ROM and play, that's it)
- ROM scan
- Support various bluetooth gamepads
and more!

Retro Game Center helps you discover and play over 15k+ classic retro/emulation video games on 15+ game systems in the palm of your hand.

It supports game search, provides convenient sorting and filtering based on game systems/rating/genre, shows detailed game info such as screenshots, description and handy google search results. You can link local roms to a game and play right inside the app. You can also bookmark your favorite games so you will never lose track of what to play next.

Supported platform/console/handheld/devices:
- Nintendo Entertainment System
- Nintendo Game Boy
- Nintendo Game Boy Color
- Nintendo Game Boy Advance
- Super Nintendo
- SEGA Master System
- SEGA Genesis/Mega Driver
- SEGA Game Gear
- SEGA 32X
- Arcade(CPS1/CPS2)

title: Evader!
description:
IT’S SIMPLE: NEVER STOP FLYING – Can You Become the Evader! Champion?

Blaze your neon trail and launch into the infinite arcade world of Evader!

RIDE TO THE HORIZON 
Jump to flight and traverse your ship on an endless voyage. The further you fly, the faster your ship will become!

BE THE PILOT
Control the ship on your own Kessel Run. Tap all four walls to change your flight path to evade the laser hazards and perilous obstacles!

BLAST TO FIRST PLACE
Boost, unlock and perfect your Evader! score to top the rankings and become the Evader! Champion in the leaderboards!

A NEW FRONTIER OF UNLOCKS
Collect, Roulette Spin and Win Gems to hack your Evader! ship to pixel perfection with brand new ships and trails to unlock!

NO MORE ADS? HACK THEM OUT WITH A ONE-TIME PURCHASE
Buy the full game and remove ads in-game for the true arcade experience.

FULL FAT are industry-leaders with over 20 years of experience in providing mobile gaming experiences on the go for players of all ages to enjoy!

title: Basketball Shot Mania
description:
Basketball Shot Mania brings the most popular street basketball machine to your mobile. Tap as fast and accurate as you can in limited time to make a high score. Especially fun to challenge your friends in a party. 

 Your mission is simple: Slide your finger on the screen of your smartphone or tablet to give the perfect direction to the ball to score point after point! Start shooting to the hoop and try to beat your own high score!

★Classic mode
Score as many points as possible within the given time.With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.
★Stage mode
 Meet the target score for each stage 
★Challenge mode
Don't miss or you will have to start over. 


How to Play:
- Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball

Game Features:
- Five unique skins: choose your favorite themed environment;
- Great game sound effects & music;
- Various difficulty levels, to make the game more exciting and interesting;
- Well-designed basketballs, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive;
- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects;


Come on now, join everybody on the playground of unlimited basketball action!

title: Anime: Final Battle
description:
Anime: Final Battle is a real time 2D fighting game with over than 50 heroes and villains from anime and manga who are ready to fight as you wish.

Are you an anime fan or an otaku?
Did you always want to be able to fight with anime characters from different universes?
Do you want to fight with Pirates, Heroes, Hunters, Ninjas, Shinigamis , Wizards or more?
Now all of these have gathered in one game. Fight as you wish. Whether it's a fight between heroes from the same universe, a different universe or a fight between villains from different anime universes who could have never been able to meet in another way. All of them are gathered here in this 2D fighting game excursively for android.

How to play:
- Tap the Left / Right button to move the character.
- To avoid a hit, teleport to the back of the enemy by tapping the up button or tap the guard button to minimize the damage.
- Tap the Attack button repeatedly to perform a combo.
- Tap the Super / Ultimate button for an epic attack that deals a lot of damage.
- Tap the Charge button to be able to use the Super / Ultimate attack.
- The first to reach zero health points loses.

Anime: Final Battle is a real time 2D fighting game with over than 50 heroes and villains from anime and manga who are ready to fight as you wish.

Are you an anime fan or an otaku?
Did you always want to be able to fight with anime characters from different universes?
Do you want to fight with Pirates, Heroes, Hunters, Ninjas, Shinigamis , Wizards or more?
Now all of these have gathered in one game. Fight as you wish. Whether it's a fight between heroes from the same universe, a different universe or a fight between villains from different anime universes who could have never been able to meet in another way. All of them are gathered here in this 2D fighting game excursively for android.

How to play:
- Tap the Left / Right button to move the character.
- To avoid a hit, teleport to the back of the enemy by tapping the up button or tap the guard button to minimize the damage.
- Tap the Attack button repeatedly to perform a combo.
- Tap the Super / Ultimate button for an epic attack that deals a lot of damage.
- Tap the Charge button to be able to use the Super / Ultimate attack.
- The first to reach zero health points loses.
summary: Fight with Pirates, Heroes, Hunters, Ninjas, Shinigamis, Wizards and more

title: Classic Space Invaders
description:
A tribute to the 80s arcades. The game is very similar to the original arcades.
Your mission is to destroy the aliens before they reach the earth. As a defense you have some barriers that will stop the enemy shots. These defenses will be restored at the beginning of each level.

Game features and how to play:
- Support Google Games, leaderboard and achievements.
- Simulation of old CRT screens like the arcades of the 80s.
- Extra life at 10,000 and every 30,000.
- Each level the aliens will be more aggressive but will give more points.
If you like retro games, you'll be fascinated by Classic Space Invaders.

(C) 2018 Classic Mania Games
All graphics and music are property of Classic Mania Games.

title: Zombie Hunter Dead Target Shooting King 3D
description:
Gosh, Undead apocalypse are killing and destroying the city. These killer and giant creatures are crawling, scrambling and attacking from all sides. The whole world is the prey of these walkers. 
Undead are rising in the whole world due a virus infection, they are scare, and getting hungry and attacking human or resident to fill their blood thirst. This evil plague is increasing and more zombies are rising. 
The human will die, our our city is also will die, this will trigger a ginat damage for our earth. 
The fist thing to do is finding the target ,aim at the target, and target the enemy squad and go for the headshot! Survive at any cost in this shooting FPS battle!
Extreme sniper commander it’s time to open anti zombie frontier. Takeout your sniper, assault rifles and other lethal weapons to combat and strike down zombies in the city streets.
You need to evacuate survivals and sweep the city from zombies to secure the human or resident race from this doom.

Act as a military shooter, chase and strike the zombies targets to smash and crush them. You required extreme shooting and Special Forces skills to kill these undead. 
This full on adventure and FPS game is consists of multiple army operations to sweep the city from zombie attack. Shoot from hiding like assassin and clear the area in time as per contract and rescue humans. 
In this zombies combat you need to fight in church, grave yards, cars, old house and highways. These killers are worst than terrorists so show no mercy and shoot the undead flesh. 
Top gunner smash and takedown all stupid zombies and be a super hero and world savior.Just like a story described in a thriller.

Defend against different types of zombies target with your weapons, then earn cash to buy yourself better equipment and weapons, choosing from modern weapons like the M1911, MP5 and AK-47. 
Although you are a tiro, you have to kill, shoot your enemies with an MP5, AK47, Desert Eagle, FN SCAR, HK 416 or a powerful grenade or bomb and many more shotguns and rifles! 
Encounter zombie apocalypse in a variety of modern spaces like the Metro Station, as they walk, run, and crawl towards you. Enjoy the three challenge modes and try to challenge the every hard doom survival mode.
For the undead zombie apocalypse, some are stationary, some are walking towards to you, some walk fast, some walk slow. You have to take different strategy, use different rule.
You even can ignite the wood with a band of hay to burn the target to dead or use stones to give them a big bang.
Do not be stupid to have a dat with these zombies, you have to kill them first,take a dead zombie overkill and have a marvelous combat experience with these undead target.

These dead zombies apocalypse will trigger a giant disaster, we have to stop it as soon as quickly and unlock the door to escape from this bloody doom.




Zombie Hunter Dead Target Shooting King 3D Features:


- Action game.
- Realistic first person shooter game.
- Realistic & Awesome physics.
- Nice Graphics
- Accurate 3D sniper rifle.
- Zombie Assault
- Kills counter.
- Amazing & special Blood effects.
- Realistic & HD graphic.

title: Mysterious Pyramid Puzzle
description:
mysterious pyramid puzzle

Your greatest Challenge awaits you in this magic magical match 3 game. Find hidden treasures of jewels beneath the pyramids of Pharaoh in ancient egypt. Switch and match diamonds complete the goal in the specified steps. Enjoy the full diamond adventure for free!

Here in Cairo, it is your job to oversee the management of the jewels within the pyramids. Most importantly you must organize them from the vast wealth that flows in from all corners of the kingdom. There're tons of levels to play through and in each one, you only have so much time to clear and get the star that falls into the bottom of the screen.

- mysterious Egypt world, hundreds of well-designed free levels!
- multiple goals, move mode, time mode, collect mode.
- easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
- stunning graphics with a highly polished interface.
- mysterious ancient Egyptian music, let you fully appreciate the mystery of ancient Egyptian.
