title: Flank That Tank!
description:
Tank combat in a fully destructible world.
Everything in the game world can be shot to pieces, using procedural destruction algorithms.

Use the virtual joystick to maneuver your tank and tap to aim and shoot.

Play the first six levels for free, and with a single purchase, all 22 levels are unlocked.

The game comes with five difficulty settings: "Little Baby", "Greenhorn", "Veteran", "Ace", "Lunatic."

With unsurpassed physics simulation, unique in 2D tank games.

This game is conceived, designed and implemented by Bram Stolk.
Tank artwork by Kay Lousberg.
Chipmunk2D is (c)2007-2015 Scott Lembcke and Howling Moon Software.
SDL2 Copyright by San Lantinga.
VMath code by Jan Bartipan.
JC Voronoi code Copyright (c) 2015 Mathias Westerdahl.
The android_fopen trick is by netguy204.

title: Retro NES - NES Emulator
description:
* A NES game file (ROM file) is necessary to play a game. 
* Copy your own NES game files to SD card or Internal Memory. (e.g. /sdcard/NES/)
* Please search games again after copy new NES game files.

Feature:
* Support NES file (.nes, .zip).
* Support android 4.0+ (suitable for android 8.0+).
* Save state and load state.
* Quick save: Double tap to quick-save (right half of screen).
* Quick load: Double tap to quick-load (left half of screen).
* Customize Control Buttons (Edit & resize).
* Turbo buttons & A+B button.
* PAL (Europe) / NTSC (USA, Japan) video modes.
* Support up to 4 Players.
* Support Rewind (Your character will never die when this feature is enabled).

title: Beer Pong Deluxe Edition
description:
Beer Pong Deluxe Edition is a game for everyone! Uses minimalistic design and effects that complements the overall gameplay and feel of the game. 

You only have to shoot the ball into the cups! It has that arcade feeling to it and has multiple modes to prolong the fun. Uses a wait-and-tap to provide more control to the aim and ball throw. 
All that fun for free!

Features
- Single mode versus AI with selectable difficulty from easy to hard 
- Offline multiplayer (Maximum 2 player per device)
- 3D gameplay/graphics
- Casual and Color beer pong mode
- Tournament (Offline versus AI with a difficulty ranging from easy to legendary)

title: Space Drift: Rush & Skid
description:
Space Drift is an exciting and fascinating racing game. You start with an spacecraft and try to drift on lanes in the outer space! Your spacecraft will be held to a pillar and swing around the corner, giving the most fabulous drift you may ever see.

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Tap the screen to start the game.
2. Watch out when the spacecraft goes into the corner.
3. Tap the screen to hold the spacecraft so that it won’t run out of the land and crash.
4. Spacecraft will accelerate, so watch out!
5. Collect coins to unlock new spacecraft and cars, each of them has different characteristics.


FEATURES:
1. One hand operation, easy to play
2. Superb racing BGM
3. Level mode and endless mode
4. Challenge the high score, and get more spacecraft and cars

We are working continuously to add new modes and contents to Space Drift: Rush & Skid, so please keep an eye on us!

title: Run Cat, Run!
description:
You are a cat. 
Isn't that enough?

Run through a world fraught with peril as you find powerups and dodge spikey plants and flying death that wants to take your furry friend from you.

Controls:
As with life, you are forever being pushed forward. So it is up to you to tap to jump or double tap to jump higher.
There may even be a secret gray powerup that increases speed and allows you to quad jump your way to safety!


This is an arcade style side scroller in its first release. You can expect updates as the user base grows.

title: Arcade Storm
description:
Arcade Storm is the first of it's kind. Full, super low latency, multiplayer arcade emulation. Using the latest in rollback networking technology to ensure the lowest latency possible, whether hosting a multiplayer game or simply spectating.

Online 4 player Bomberman? Challenge someone during a Street Fighter playthrough? Arrange to meet up with a friend to mash through Final Fight? All possible with a few clicks.

Not looking for online play? Offline is fully supported and will send no data to our servers.

Supports Mame or Finalburn rom sets, ~1500 roms via a fully graphical rom browser. Pads and joysticks fully supported in game, we've tested a wide variety of bluetooth and usb controllers.

Our current servers are located in London, San Francisco and New York. More will be added as required.

Have fun and fire any feedback to - arcadestorm.networks@gmail.com

title: Super Saiyan God Legend
description:
Do you like Super Saiyan?? Do you like the amazing skills of saiyan hero as goku, vegeta, majin buu …?
Let play the most fantastic game of this manga series: Super Saiyan God Legend.
In this game, you have chance to become super warriors in dragon pearl world, use cool skills like Ki Blast, Kamehameha, Bigbang attack, Dragon Recall … to kill enemy and get highest score. To complete the mission, please collect enough 7 dragon eggs. BE aware of other saiyan heros. 4 Buttons on the right side are skills mode, however it needs mana to make the powerfull skills.

Features:
- Easy to play, very addictive: control the saiyan warrior with the button to have victory
- Many characters with individual special skills, Goku, Gohan, Nammake
- Beautiful transformation effect: you can transform to SSJ, SSJ Blue, SSJ GOD …

Let play and share best score with everyone. Who will be the number one? If you like this, please comment and review to show your opinions so that we can make better games.

There are 30 playable characters in most versions of the game and 135. All characters featured in the previous game are available in this game as well. Battles can now involve up to ten characters fighting one at a time on the battle-field, with one teammate coming.

title: Origin Glory
description:
Origin Glory is a mobile action MMORPG. Choose one of 5 classes and set off on a dungeon-running adventure to rid the world of evil.

Origin Glory  is a mobile spin-off of the classic Korean MMORPG Game. It is an action MMORPG with a focus on dungeon running, screen-dominating spells, and fast-paced leveling. Choose one of 5 classes: DK, DW, or Elf, v.v... Set off on an adventure through Story Dungeons, Daily Dungeons, Party Dungeons, and the Endless Tower. Take on other players in one-on-one Arena matches, climbing the leaderboards as you go. Take part in one of many events including World Bosses and the Colosseum. Or just set the game to play itself and sit back as your character slowly becomes more powerful

title: The Stickman Wizard
description:
The Stickman Wizard is a unique arcade game in which you will have to fight for a magician against a large number of opponents.

Everybody dreams of carrying a magic staff, and now it is possible to find it from the stickman, and now he will use his strength and capabilities to fight with enemy soldiers.
Now you can download The Stickman Wizard on Android and go through a new adventure. Stickman became a true master of magic along with a staff.
As it turned out, the staffs are able to create real miracles and shoot magic balls.
Ahead is waiting for you to meet with a huge number of enemy goblins, orcs, archers, swordsmen, spearmakers, as well as magicians and others, ready to go for everything to win.
Each opponent has his own skills and characteristics, some of them can be teleported thus dodging our shots, somebody runs up and explodes thereby undermining us, somebody can tear off his head and throw at us and many others that you learn by playing in The Stickman Wizard.
But our magician has his magic staff with whom he is ready to meet his enemies. Each staff has its own characteristics play a game and find out what.
The staffs can shoot explosive, poisonous, icy, fiery, black holes and many other magic balls.
What would last longer and survive in the game is armor and helmets that will protect you from enemy attacks, as well as you will be helped by skills that can heal and also destroy the enemy and protect our hero.

This game is a wonderful combination of beautiful explosive effects and realistic physics.

Features:
✔15 staffs with different characteristics
✔For more than 50 outfits to protect
✔More than 30 skills for attack and defense
✔More than 20 opponents with different characteristics
✔Realistic physics
✔Excellent graphic design

title: The Last Runner
description:
Run without limits in an abandoned town!  

Ray, our hero, is an experienced runner with parkour knowledges.  He was born in Cat Town 18 years ago, but today that town is not the same.  Now it's an abandoned place, dangerous, with radiactive waters and infected cats...

But Ray is a great runner and adventurer (a bit opportunist), he knows about Cat Town's treasures, there's a lot of coins and hidden treasures and he's ready to collect it all!

Run like a thunder and get as many coins as you can, play the story mode to train yourself and try to beat your best score in the endless game mode.  Compete against other runners in the hi-score leaderboard and improve your reflexes in this one touch pixel art game.  

Good luck and enjoy!

FEATURES

•       Story mode with detailed level design.
•	Challenging endless mode. 
•	Secret areas with a lot of coins!
•	Different paths to complete most of the areas, risk & reward.
•	Original soundtrack with great action music.
•	Modern pixel art style.
•	One touch gameplay.
•	Hi-Scores.
descriptionHTML:
Run without limits in an abandoned town!

Ray, our hero, is an experienced runner with parkour knowledges. He was born in Cat Town 18 years ago, but today that town is not the same. Now it's an abandoned place, dangerous, with radiactive waters and infected cats...

But Ray is a great runner and adventurer (a bit opportunist), he knows about Cat Town's treasures, there's a lot of coins and hidden treasures and he's ready to collect it all!

Run like a thunder and get as many coins as you can, play the story mode to train yourself and try to beat your best score in the endless game mode. Compete against other runners in the hi-score leaderboard and improve your reflexes in this one touch pixel art game.

Good luck and enjoy!

FEATURES

• Story mode with detailed level design.
• Challenging endless mode.
• Secret areas with a lot of coins!
• Different paths to complete most of the areas, risk & reward.
• Original soundtrack with great action music.
• Modern pixel art style.
• One touch gameplay.
• Hi-Scores.
summary: Use your parkour knowledge and run like a thunder in Cat Town!

title: Color Tumble
description:
Destroy cubes of different colors as they fall from space by tapping the button of the same color. Great for a quick distraction or stress relief. The longer you play the quicker and faster the blocks fall. The blocks can be slowed down for super casual gameplay or you can add faster firing multiple rockets to maximize your own personal high score!

Please contact me at www.corkiesoftwaredesign.com for feedback or support. This is my first game I would love to hear your feedback. 8)

title: Mu Empire
description:
Mu Imperio version 3.0 Latino

- Hace diez años, Mu se convirtió en un MMO 3D. Actualmente, [Mu Free] seguirá ese clásico, ¡oficialmente de regreso! Con el diseño Unity3D, creando el poderoso mundo de fantasía, El héroe de la inmortalidad. Mu inmortal, en honor a 5 clases.

- ¡Prepárate para la experiencia Full 3D EPIC MMORPG! ¡Los MMORPG móviles nunca serán lo mismo! Experimenta un emocionante MMORPG en tiempo real que te permite emprender un viaje de fantasía épico. Conoce amigos, crea fiestas y prepárate para luchar contra el mal en un vasto mundo abierto para devolver la tranquilidad.

CARACTERÍSTICAS 
- Sistema de renacido
- Muchos nuevos accesorios
- Agregar algunas características aparecen
- Evento del festival semanal
- Booses de Mapas
- Sistema de monturas
- El sistema del Salvador
- Sistema de armadura
- Y muchos más están esperando que explores .........

El juego tiene cinco protagonistas principales que reproducen la apariencia original, las estadísticas, las habilidades, los elementos basados ​​en el Mu original:

❖ Dark Knight incluye poder y salud.
❖ Dark Wizard es flexible e intenso con el hechizo del cielo y la tierra.
❖ Dark Elf es ágil con excelente alcance.
❖ Magic Knight es la combinación perfecta del poder y la magia de Dark Knight y Dark Wizards.
❖ Invocador con poder mágico mágico.

- Puedes elegir y personalizar de 5 clases diferentes: Dark Knight, Dark Wizard, Elf, Magic Knight y Summoner
- Mejore sus habilidades y sea testigo de la deslumbrante exhibición de habilidades únicas de cada héroe.
- ¡Recoge diamantes, materiales, zens y esencias estelares en áreas abiertas de PVP! Dominar y acumularlos a todos!
- Puede intercambiar equipos con otros jugadores a través del sistema de Comercio.
- El audio reacciona a su manipulación del mundo para proporcionar un paisaje sonoro surrealista y hermoso. Mejor experiencia con auriculares.
- All-Server Guild Corps - ¡Únete a hermandades de ideas afines para formar un cuerpo! ¡Cuanto más nos paremos, más fuertes y más prósperos seremos!
- Level-Cap Raise - ¡Rompe los límites! El nivel máximo se ha aumentado hasta 15 Rebirth 100.

Unir fuerzas con jugadores poderosos y ganar rivales en el mundo encantador Mu hoy!

SOPORTE

Cualquier duda o inquietud o cualquier ayuda, por favor visitenos en :

https://www.facebook.com/MU-Epire-336447153593612/
muimperio.soporte@gmail.com

title: Cowboy Surf Run
description:
Cowboy Run Rush 2019 is a new 3D arcade game now you can download it for free to enjoy with your friends.
In this subway Run Surf, you can challenge your friends where you have to spend a lot of obstacles also collect the maximum of 
coins and gold to open new worlds like: jungle, city....

This Subway Runner Surf 3D game contains a new character for the famous animation of Cowboy.


Characteristics :


- A major challenge for many forms of crowded obstacles
- A piece of gold must be collected
- 3D world and high quality
- Endless game everyone can play
- New Boy character
- Jump or run left or right to avoid obstacles.
- Free class offers by connecting to facebook or watching video ads
- New subway scene, beautiful underground city and forest.
- multiplier, use them easy to have a high score.
- very good quality

How to play:

+ Swipe left to turn left
+ Swipe right to turn right
+ Swipe back to scroll
+ Drag forward to jump
+ When you run, you have to collect gold coins, to buy characters and objects in the subway game
+ Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, gates and subway trains.


We will add new characters ( Pet, Kid, Princess, Zombie, Cat, Ninja, Girl, Grandma for free! Don’t miss it!

Do not forget to collect as many coins as possible because you need to buy a lot of things and characters,
Download it now and start playing

title: Lava Llama
description:
Llama, meet lava.  Now run away from that lava...as quickly as you can!

Enter into an 8-bit world with exciting 8-bit graphics and immersive 8-bit music as you guide your llama to 8-bit safety.  Discover new zones at altitudes high and low! Watch out for pineapples, pigeons and more!  What caused this massive volcanic eruption anyway? How far will the lava go? Don't question the premise -- JUST STAY ALIVE!

Future app updates will include new zones, music, obstacles, llamas...and more!
descriptionHTML:
Llama, meet lava. Now run away from that lava...as quickly as you can!

Enter into an 8-bit world with exciting 8-bit graphics and immersive 8-bit music as you guide your llama to 8-bit safety. Discover new zones at altitudes high and low! Watch out for pineapples, pigeons and more! What caused this massive volcanic eruption anyway? How far will the lava go? Don't question the premise -- JUST STAY ALIVE!

Future app updates will include new zones, music, obstacles, llamas...and more!

title: Droid
description:
Blast your way through 35 stages of increasingly hostile and diverse enemy droids.  Destroy all the enemy droids in each stage to progress to the next.  Droid features numerous sophisticated scoring methods and secret scoring techniques.

The free mode features 10 stages, 14 enemy types and an online leaderboard unique to the free mode.

The full version can be purchased from within the game and features 25 stages, 40+ enemy types, an online leaderboard unique to the full version, and 10 achievements.

Each version has its own local high score table.

Droid supports Google Play Games leaderboards and achievements. Please note that achievements can only be unlocked and leaderboard entries made while signed-in to Google+.

title: 3D Twisty Arrow Hit Game - Archery Games
description:
3D Twisty Arrow Hit Game is a simple tapping strategy game fun for users of all ages. Shoot arrows at the spinning circle / wooden stem target but don't touch the other arrows. The ultimate arrow challenge is here! Throw the arrows into the logs to break them. Slash the wooden stems to unlock new arrows.

> Tap your screen to shoot arrows at the spinning wheel / wooden stem.
> Hit the bulls eye with the arrows without touching other arrows around the circle.

> Different levels spin, twist, and rotate in different directions and at different speeds to give you more challenge and hit into the target.

Use the right strategy to improve your accuracy and hit the bullseye on the circle as it twists every time. The more arrows you shoot, the harder it is to be accurate and hit the bullseye. Can you beat this impossible rotating wheel? What level can you get to? Download right now and spin the wheel to find out.

title: Kirby Games - Match 3
description:
Kirby Games is addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with Kirby characters.

Kirby Games is simple to play but hard to master. This Match 3 game will test your puzzle and strategy skills to see whether you have what it takes to win! 

How to play:
- Match 3 same characters to earn points.
- Match over 4 characters to obtain specials. 
- Combine the powerful specials to gain an epic elimination!
- Complete your missions within a given number of moves!

Features:
- Easy addictive casual strategy game, loved by both men and women.
- Brain puzzle game, easy to play, hard to master.
- Exquisite gameplay, experience, graphics and puzzles, and the fun is fun.
- No life limit, you can play unlimited, all free.
- No need to use traffic, you can play anywhere, anytime.
- Support all tablets and full screen.

This game is very fun and relaxing way to kill time :)

title: PAC Arcade
description:
Mr. PAC is a game where you must complete each maze by consuming every crypto cent pellet in place. There are multiple enemies based on popular cryptocurrencies that will chase you throughout the maze. You may defeat the enemies by consuming Super Pellet Purses and then colliding with the enemies.

Each level has three stages. Each stage is the same maze layout, but enemies will be faster and Super Pellet Purses are more scarce. The last stage is designed to be more challenging where multiple enemies will try to hunt Mr.PAC down at a faster speed.

Once you complete all three stages, next level will be unlocked with a new maze layout once you buy credits with PAC coins. In order to fully complete a level, the user must finish all three stages without getting a Game Over. 

Game Over is obtained by running out of lives. If the user gets to a certain stage and runs out of lives, Game Over will be obtained and must repeat from first stage to try again.

To finish a stage, Mr.PAC must consume all the pellets in the maze.

Once you complete all three stages, next level will be unlocked with a new maze layout once you buy credits with PAC coins. In order to fully complete a level, the user must finish all three stages without getting a Game Over.

Game Over is obtained by running out of lives. If the user gets to a certain stage and runs out of lives, Game Over will be obtained and must repeat from first stage to try again.

To finish a stage, Mr.PAC must consume all the pellets in the maze.

title: Super momo jump
description:
Super MOMO Jump is a beautiful and classic adventure game. Bring you back to a world of wonders and fight with monsters.

Several evil monsters invaded the world of MOMO. They also steal the ancestral treasure of MOMO. MOMO sinks into the cave and we strive to take it back! MOMO needs your help badly. Help him take back his treasure and save his world!

MOMO's ancestral treasure has been stolen by evil monster. To take the gold coin MOMO coins start his adventure.

Join the adventure and help MOMO to beat monsters and get his treasure, the road is too hard and monsters are very dangerous son take care and play safe

Control MOMO to run, jump and jump on monsters. Start your adventure,
run across multiple worlds as you have smash through these tricky monsters.
Filled with unforeseen obstacles, struggle to reach the FINAL destination. So MOMO can take back his treasure. You're ready?


Tips: monster tunnel attack in the air, double jump over these long gaps.

Super MOMO Jump Features:
- New puzzle elements, exciting adventure
- Classic platform game and easy to control
- Beautiful graphics, lively and smooth animation
- 15 well designed levels, full of pitfalls
- Tons of delicate monsters, difficult to manage
- Custom accessories, unlock and upgrade to help you
- Stunning graphics, work better
- Different monster has different skills, jump to plant them
-Three buttons to control MOMO
- several scenarios with beautiful graphics
- Secret tunnels: surprises are always dangerous
-very good music in different worlds and Levels
-Vampire monsters and obstacles can attack you at any time
- Different paths and hallucinating animations
-unlock levels by coins

Find hidden chests in secret paths, open them,
surprise you! Note: Monster is still with the treasure. Time to take an adventure! Free download ! We will run and jump !

title: Vote Blitz! Clicker arcade & idle politics game
description:
Do you dream of being president, but your'e still just tapping cookies? The heroes of democracy welcome you! Become one of them in the exciting game Vote Blitz! Begin your political adventure with a tap!

A financial tycoon and communist, a democrat and dictator, or a woman from a distant land shrouded in magic - 18 unique characters need your help in a frenzied political race that will challenge your fingers. You'll never get bored with this arcade-style game! The game has begun!

It's as though the heroes of democracy have stepped out of the world of real politics. They might remind you of Trump, Putin, Kin Jong-un, or other famous people you know, but keep in mind that any similarities are purely coincidental! That kind of stuff happens in idle games.

Dive into a political adventure, go down the rabbit hole, and grope the underbelly of democracy! This clicker will give you amazing countries, and you'll have a chance to prove yourself in all of them and become a hero who will lead your people to prosperity! Or, if you've ever dreamed of being a terrifying dictator, seize power by force and hold an entire country in the palm of your hand! Your mom is nuts about this arcade-style game, you know.
100 unique levels will keep you engaged and make you tap like you've never tapped before! What'll it be: 10, 20, 50, or 300 taps per minute? It's time to stretch your fingers and prove that you're the faster, most agile tapper in this political game.
Every country has its own characters: a dictator, a lazy tycoon, a democrat, a communist, and more! All of them are worthy to become president! Choose one of them and help them assume power and honor among their fellow citizens! Want your hero to win an election in every country and conquer half the world? Now's your chance! Take part in a political clash and prove that you can seize power and become the leader, then change your citizenship
and fight for new democratic horizons! The clicker Vote Blitz! lets you do just that! Look, your mom's friend's son is already posting screenshots from this arcade-style game.
No political battle can be fair. Every dictator know that. It's true in real politics, to say nothing about the game. The clicker Vote Blitz! will give you boosters to increase your chances of winning! You can stop time to regain your strength and tap some cookies. Boosters give you the ability to bribe voters and get rid of those who want to see another character get elected.

The game genre known as "idle games" will really suck you in. If you're lucky you can find a suitcase with a surprise in it that will give you political power and bring you closer to your desired goal. It doesn't matter who your character is: the people's darling or a dictator who holds their country in an iron fist. There's a suitcase for all of them.
Your voters' votes can be used for more than just counting - you can spend them to get boosters, unlock new characters, or change your president's citizenship! If there's a little dictator inside of you, changing citizenship could really come in handy - why rule one country when you can rule the world? Value the votes you get - they'll help you win this political game and become a true hero of democracy!
Delete all the new games from 2018, set your cookie-clicker aside, down with lazy tycoons, forget about "tap tap tap" idle games. Arcade-style games and clickers quake before Vote Blitz! It truly is the most finger-pounding game of 2018.

ATTENTION! You can download and play Vote Blitz! for free, but certain in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this function, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Please keep in mind that, in accordance with the User Agreement, only users who are 3 or older can download and play Vote Blitz! Please also note that our everyday game Vote Blitz does not collect users' personal data because we already know everything about you. Just kidding! We actually value your privacy.

title: Writer Simulator 2018
description:
"Writer Simulator" – classic 2D game, getting everything best of the genre! You are about to take the path from a beginning writer to a founder of your own corporation. The game gives you these features: creating your character, writing your own books, different types of jobs, business creation, finding your love, different random events, karma system, different types of choices, competition with friends, achievements and easter eggs!
But that’s not all. To learn it’s secrets you should download it and try it out yourself! And now here is what we have:
-Character creation: choose your name, age and gender
-Writing your own dream book: choose your genre, writing and form. Each book will be rated by top critics, from whose ratings your income depends.
-Working on different jobs: helper, manager, office-manager and many more. Each job has its own tasks and salary!
-Creating your own business: if you want to become a businessman, you can save some money and create your own corporation! Choose your own name!
-Finding your love: depending on your gender you can fall in love with a guy or a girl and make something out! You choose the look, age and many more!
-Random events: you can go shopping and accidently lose your money, or you might get robbed, or you can find some money. And there is a whole lot of different random events out there!
-Karma system: depending on your behavior your karma will punish or gift you. Only you choose, who you want to be!
-A lot of choices: Yes, we face choices everyday, so we do here. For example, your gf or bf wants to go for a walk, you can go with them or refuse. Everything leads to different conciquences!
-Friends competing: as soon as you get your own corporation, you can get it the biggest among your friends or even all around the world!
-A lot of achievements and Easter Eggs!

recentChanges:
It’s still the same version of 2017, but with minor changes. In this version of the game, the balance of the game is NOT changed. But the following changes are made:
- Same-sex relationships are added.
- Added small changes in the gameplay.
- Slightly changed design.
- Fixed bugs.
If you want, you can download our new games, for example, "Movie Director Simulator" or "Writer Simulator 2".

title: Color Dash – Addictive Switch Color game
description:
Get the coolest and greatest color game on your smartphone for FREE now. Color Dash is the latest and coolest color swap game on the play store. The main objective of this addictive arcade game is to guide your character and let it break the obstacles that have the same color of it without hitting any other color shape. But, keep in mind that the color of your character will change once you hit a new color line, so once you get the new color, you don't need to pass through a shape with another color than yours. The game will get harder as your progress on it, but you need to show your reflection and speed skills to score the highest possible score in this addictive endless switch color game.

Color Dash is a free brain challenging color game, one that relies on your speed and reflex to get a higher score. Train your hand and eye coordination with this free color swap game and have fun playing for hours, you will not feel bored even if you play it for many hours. When you are waiting in line, when you are on a break, or when you are riding a bus or train, play this fun and addictive free color shapes game to avoid getting bored with nothing to do. Your reflection needs training too!
Sounds easy, but can you really do it and go far in this endless color swap game without any mistake?

Why do you need to donwload and install Color Dash on your smartphone or tablet instead of other color games?
✓ We made some Cool and smooth high-quality shapes and awesome colors to give you the best experience while playing the greatest switch color game ever!
✓Have fun with Snake, Butterfly, Fish and many more color dash.
✓ Our color shapes game is FREE and it will stay Free for life, so there are No hidden fees, no special members and no annual subscription to enjoy the best arcade game ever!    
✓ Fantastic theme graphics and immersive sound effects. We took design seriously and we want our users to enjoy this game immensely.  
✓ Our game is endless. Yes, Endless! You will enjoy playing as much as you want because the only one who can stop you is you.
✓ Since the colors and shapes are generated randomly, on occasion, it's not possible to score the highest score on the first try. But, Don't Give Up and try again, you will reach it for sure.
✓ Perfect for time killing, leisure, brain training, brain challenging, bonding with family and friends. Good for kids too.

Have fun with friends and family!

What are you waiting for? Download Color Dash now and start playing the most addictive color game to tickle your brain!

description:
Klick Klack is a deviously simple maze game.

Tap the tiles to rotate them and create a path through the labyrinth. Collect yellow pills to score points, but don’t run into a dead end or fall off the board!

Score enough points on each level to unlock bigger, faster and trickier mazes.

* Stylish and smooth graphics!
* Global leaderboards!
* Tiny download size!

title: One Minute Block Puzzle, A Tower Building Game
description:
Minute To Win It - Balance Block Pyramid Challenge  


A physics-based skill/puzzle game. Balance the stack of blocks to the target area.
Challenging enough for older children, but easy enough for everyone to join in the fun!

Balance pyramid of wooden blocks, ice blocks, Girls, Boys, and Panner.
It seems very simple but difficult game to play.

One Minute Block Puzzle Game is really simple but difficult game because of its very realistic physics. The goal of the game is building the pyramid by tapping on the screen.

How to Play
1. Stack up the blocks and construct the pyramid
2. Build the pyramid as fast as you can. Be careful about balancing.

Features
- Very fun and enjoyable game
- 15 interesting levels
- Rhythm music and beautiful graphics
- Suitable for players of all age
- Tiny game size and run well
- A physics-based game, challenge your accuracy and timing ability

The game is about building a pyramid from blocks, ice cubes, girls, boys, and paneer cubes.

The classic stack and crash game! Want a game experience that combines physics, skill, suspense, laughter, and maybe a little luck?

title: Mallow Man
description: Mallow Man is a marshmallow that has come to life and has the ability to move and jump. AND HE’S TRAPPED!! He needs your help to escape the endless cup! Mallow Man is jumping off of and climbing blocks as they fall, but he must be careful because he can be crushed by them if he doesn’t get out of the way on time. Don’t hesitate for too long, though, because the blistering hot chocolate is rising, and Mallow Man will die instantly if it reaches him! Earn coins as you jump through this addicting game, and you can unlock different styles of blocks and backgrounds, allowing Mallow Man to climb in different environments.

title: Chipmunk Bubble Pop
description:
Chipmunk Bubble Paradise - Bubble Shooter is not only an addictive game but also a brain teaser puzzle game. You should shoot bubbles carefully because you have limited bubble in your hand. If you like, you can change the bubble on canon with the next bubble. Use power-ups like color ball and fire ball to pop bubbles.
There are lots of free levels in bubble shooter chipmunk that you can spend your time. When you shoot a bubble to the bubbles of the same color, they will blast. It's really is a Fun and addictive bubble shooter game!
FEATURES
- Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
- Fresh and colorful bubble graphics
- Adorable and cute characters: Panda, Bunny, Puppy
- Relaxing and refreshing background music
- Smooth bubble shooting experience
- Easy and fun to play, hard to master
- Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
HOW TO PLAY
- Tap screen to shoot bubbles
- Match 3 or more bubbles to pop
- Use limited bubbles to accomplish various level targets

Let's go! Pop your way through tricky challenges with adorable Chipmunks!

title: The Pixel Escape
description:
Pixel Escape is a charming platform running game with drawing mechanic. The proud little pixels lived happily in Pixeland, until the glitch started corrupting the world. Use the power of magic ink and save their world, one pixel at a time.
* Colorful pixelart graphics - HD? Retina? We have glorious resolution of 260x160.
* Awesome 8bit soundtrack - for that retro feel.
* Oldschool difficulty - remember your happy childhood and countless broken gamepads?
* Unique gameplay - Use your mouse to draw with magic ink and save the little pixels from spikes, lava and deadly drops.

title: Switch Ball
description:
Looking for a really addicting game? Look no further! 

Switch Ball is an arcade game where you tap the screen to go up or down, in order to make sure the ball passes through the green blocks! Make sure to avoid those red ones, or else its game over! The more time you stay alive the more points you get!

Challenge your friends to see if you can beat each others high scores!

Are you up for the challenge?!

title: Sling Ball Adventure
description:
Challenge your skills with Sling Ball Adventure, the addictive and exciting swipe game where your reactions and reflexes will be tested to the fullest! Sling the balls as fast as you can and try to avoid the obstacles on your way to get as far as possible in this awesome endless swipe game!

SLING THE BALLS FAST 
If you like playing simple, yet challenging swipe games that will test your reflexes and reactions then this is the most addictive and exciting swipe game you can choose to play. With simple HD graphics, easy to play and very entertaining, all you need to do on the endless swipe game is to sling the balls as fast as you can to get far and win high scores for your achievements. Swipe to sling the balls as long and fast as you can to win high scores and become the ultimate player of this arcade swipe game!

AVOID THE RED OBSTACLES ON YOUR WAY UP 
As you play and try to sling the balls as fast as you can, to make this endless swipe game even more challenging and test your reactions, you need to be careful and precise slinging the balls and in the same time avoiding the red obstacles that are on your way. Red dots and red squares are making your way up harder, so you need to sling the balls fast without touching any obstacles that can finish the swipe game for you. How far will you go? Have fun testing your reactions and reflexes on this slide game. 
 
TEST YOUR SKILLS & GET AS FAR AS POSSIBLE 
This swipe game will certainly allow you to have endless fun playing while testing your skills with the exciting endless swipe gameplay. If you are able to get far up slinging the ball without touching any red obstacles blocking your way, you will get high scores to become the best player of the arcade swipe game. Be careful! The more you progress, the more challenges are on your way. Get as far as possible!

- Easy to play and challenging
- Test your reactions 
- Simple HD graphics 
- Sling the balls as fast as you can 
- Avoid the red on your way  
- Get as far as possible and win high scores 
- FREE to play endless swipe game

Sling the balls fast and avoid the obstacles on your way to test your skills and get far to win scores!
Download Sling Ball Adventure now for FREE and enjoy!

title: Xonix 3D: classic arcade game
description:
Meet the remake of your favorite 80's game! The essence of the game is simple: capture a certain amount of the sea, avoiding enemies on the playing field.

Features

Interesting levels
Complete all 30 levels of normal mode! Each level contains different combinations of tasks, for which you will receive stars. To perform all these tasks will have to try! But the efforts will not be in vain – for the received stars you will be able to open some skins for the player for free.
Set the best record in each of 5 levels of infinite mode! After you grab 70% of the field, it will again become unoccupied, and enemies will become faster, but you will receive more points for each captured part of the playing field. Each level contains two enemies of the same type, so here you can try different strategies to deal with them.

Variety of enemies
Choose the most effective strategy against each of the 6 types of enemies! At first you will meet non-dangerous enemies, who can only move by sea or land. But then you can meet enemies who have high speed, the ability to leave dangerous spikes, grab the territory back or even the opportunity to become invisible!

Amazing 3D graphics
Enjoy the game with amazing 3D graphics, which is optimized for your mobile device.

Bonuses
Have time to pick up bonuses that randomly appear on the playing field! In the game there are 3 types of bonuses: player acceleration, slowing down enemies and extra life. You can improve the effect of bonuses in the store for coins, which can be obtained during the game.

A lot of player skins
Choose the appropriate skin player among 11 skins with a variety of combinations of characteristics! Each skin has 4 characteristics:
•	life (affects the number of lives at the beginning of the level);
•	speed (affects the speed of movement);
•	duration (affects the duration of the bonuses);
•	luck (affects the frequency of the appearance of bonuses).
Spend a few coins to buy the desired skin and passing the level will be easier!

title: Hydra Run
description:
The goal of Hydra Run is to survive as long as you can. Jump over incoming snowball enemies as you strive for your new high score! The controls are simple - just tap the screen to jump, and hold to jump higher/ break your fall.

Characters:
Penguin, Polar Bear, Rabbit, Duck, Elephant, Lion, ???? (Achieve Score > 9999)

Features:
- Tap to Jump
- Endless Level!
- Day & Night Themes!
- Linked to your Hydra Account!

This game is a Hydra Game, so there are a few things to expect.
1) Characters you unlock in this game can be used within other Hydra games
2) Your upgrades and tokens are shared between different Hydra games
3) The Hydra Tokens you earn are linked to your Hydra account and can be spent within every Hydra app or service
4) Even without a Hydra Account, these benefits may persist across all Hydra games on your device!

As Hydra grows, all of its services and features will become exponentially better. Thanks for your support. Enjoy!

Regards,
Haidar Hammoud
Founder of HYDRA

And I love all the children? Of course sweet cakes! Cook cupcakes, candies, cakes according to a unique recipe. The main purpose of this app is to offer children value and create an understanding of caring for a living being.

You can see that different colored dolls will like different versions of recipes and sweets. So, on the table we have butter, milk, sugar, eggs. Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and put in a baking dish. Just be careful not to overdo it with the timer, and then burn the cake! 
Now make a cake of layers, make as many levels! Great, it remains to decorate the cake with caramel, banana, strawberry. 

And, you can make a birthday cake for his birthday! 

Ksi meritos play with newborn care for them and bake cupcakes and cakes!

title: Tire Rush
description:
Welcome to world of endless running. Let’s recall childhood memories, hit the tire and run on endless track. Don’t miss the great tire running adventure right now. Ultimate runner: tire rush is endless tire running game with unique characters and features. Hit play and enter in endless world of running fun. 

Ultimate rush: tire run is one of the best 3D running game for people of all ages. Run with tire on multiple tracks, collect power-ups, unlock multiple characters and see how far you can run. Enjoy exhilarating running, swap runner to get coins, gems and water power-ups, and reach at insane speed in this frenzied endless running game. Run with magical spirit, unleash special powers and conquer obstacles on fast paced tracks. 

Ultimate tire run is the best epic adventure game for everyone. Run forward, run fast as you can, gather coins and diamonds, dodge hurdles and have one of the best arcade fun in this frenzy running game. Have a adventure run on fantastic endless path.

Game Play

Tire rush ultimate runner is simple running game with fantastic gameplay. Hit the tire, start running, earn coins, get diamonds, keep your water energy level up and have one of the best running game experience. Unlimited endless running with unlimited coins and gems, it will be great running experience. Power-ups of water will help you to run more distance. Run to chase top scores and achievements in this epic adrenaline rush.

Multiple players and tires added with different powers are added to have more fun. Three different environments with eye-catching colors. Upgrade your player’s water power level and run more. Speed boost up button will increase players speed instantly. On ending water level, game will be over. So, maintain your water level while running and have more fun. On colliding with a hurdle or on end of water level, a review will be given and player can continue running.

Cutting edge graphics and beautiful color combination with addition of melodious sounds. Different environments are added with different hurdles. Beautiful characters and their crazy animations are amazing.

Touch and button controls are added in this endless rush: tire runner game. Both controls are smooth and flowing. Game performance is also best. Compatible with most of android devices and gives best performance. 

Features

•	Best endless 3D running game
•	3 exciting environments
•	5 different characters with different water powers
•	Unique feature of water power is added
•	Fantastic animations of characters are added
•	Multiple tires with realistic tire physics
•	Coins and gems are available to unlock new tires and players
•	Stunning graphics and best color combinations
•	Single player offline game
•	Totally free game but inn-app purchases added to ease player purchasing
•	Quality sounds added

title: Road Fighter Car - Classic 2D road car racing game
description:
Classic road racing game, Avoid other cars by moving left and right.
Simple rules and operation, suitable for everyone.
Constantly transcend and challenge yourself.

Road Fighter Features:
✪ Classic road car racing game, full of nostalgia.
✪ Avoid other cars by moving left and right.
✪ Complex road design is full of challenges.
✪ Simple operation, suitable for everyone.
    ○ Touch the left screen to move left.
    ○ Touch the right screen to move right.
✪ 4 featured maps, village, viaduct, desert and beach.
✪ Endless mode, Travel farther before the fuel is exhausted.
✪ Rainbow car, add fuel for you.
✪ Easy game, we can play a game at any time.
✪ Support both mobiles and tablets.
✪ Global leaderboards. Contest with your friends.

- Suitable for all ages and for Deadpool fans
- Nice looking 3D graphics
- Game totally free for Deadpool fans, no need for internet connection

Download now and join your friends in the fun! Play NOW!

title: Ice Cream Snatcher
description:
This is a fun and addictive game for people of all ages! 

The challenge is to catch as many scoops of ice cream as possible while trying to avoid catching any poops. As the game progresses the falling process gradually speeds up and makes the game even more challenging!

If you catch 3 poops the game will end.

Try to beat your High Score and increase your ice cream catching skills!
descriptionHTML:
This is a fun and addictive game for people of all ages!

The challenge is to catch as many scoops of ice cream as possible while trying to avoid catching any poops. As the game progresses the falling process gradually speeds up and makes the game even more challenging!

If you catch 3 poops the game will end.

Try to beat your High Score and increase your ice cream catching skills!
summary: You need to catch the ice cream, but avoid the poop.

title: Wheely World
description:
Take the drivers seat in your favorite vehicle and navigate over, under and around the constantly changing scenery. You'll never have the same run twice! 

Push yourself to get the high score or climb the challenge ranks!

All worlds are free and come with their own unique vehicle to get you started.

summary: Challenge your driving skills across the ever evolving lands of Wheely World!
recentChanges:
*** Control overhaul ***
Removed some environmental forces which weren't obvious and could fight player input.
Controls are much more arcadey now and should appear more responsive.

*** Candy World ***
Tweaked the rainbow strap obstacle so that you can drive over it properly like a bridge.

*** UI improvements ***
Stopped world reset count down if a popup is on screen.

title: Knife Master vs Fruit
description:
Throw the knives into the fruit to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives. Each 5th stage is defended by a boss - beat them to get exclusive knives!

I challenge you to beat all the bosses!!!

Glad to see you in the magical burger restaurant! Rapunzel has opened a new burger cafe, in the menu burgers, hamburgers, hot dogs, french fries, cupcakes, milkshakes and many other delicious dishes. title: Safe Chicken - Sicheres Huhn
description:
Save the chicken is one of the most challenging of 2018. All you have to do is help the chicken to go up.

If you can score 100 you are one of the best Arcade players in the world. 

All you need to move the shield and use it to prevent objects from bursting up the chicken's bubble and help it go up. An amazing arcade game that surely needs a good focus.
The game is easy to control as you can play it with your right or left thumb. One hand game, no hassle. This game can be played by anyone. The game is friendly.

Game Features:
- Free and easy to play
- One finger control (99% of you will use the thumb ;) )
- Different size and shape of obstacles and new experience every time you restart the game
- Endless gameplay, endless scores. Challenge your friends!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Retten Sie das Huhn ist eine der schwierigsten von 2018. Alles, was Sie tun müssen, ist zu helfen, das Huhn zu gehen.

Wenn Sie 100 Punkte erzielen, sind Sie einer der besten Arcade-Spieler der Welt.

Alles, was du brauchst, um den Schild zu bewegen und ihn zu benutzen, um zu verhindern, dass Gegenstände die Hühnerblase platzen und ihr helfen, nach oben zu gehen. Ein erstaunliches Arcade-Spiel, das sicherlich einen guten Fokus braucht.
Das Spiel ist einfach zu steuern, da Sie es mit Ihrem rechten oder linken Daumen spielen können. Einhandspiel, keine Hektik. Dieses Spiel kann von jedem gespielt werden. Das Spiel ist freundlich.

Spielfunktionen:
- Kostenlos und einfach zu spielen
- Ein Finger Kontrolle (99% von Ihnen wird den Daumen benutzen;))
- Verschiedene Größe und Form von Hindernissen und neue Erfahrung jedes Mal, wenn Sie das Spiel neu starten
- Endless Gameplay, endlose Partituren. Fordere deine Freunde heraus!

title: Sprout Climb
description:
Sprout Climb is a lightweight, simple and with only one hand playable arcade game. 

Be a little, red sprout, use your bouncy bottom and swing yourself high towards the sunshine. Thereby experience what the right timing might mean. 

But be aware, even sprouts do not have time to waste and are threatend by poisonous burdens.
Luckily some useful items may help you proofing yourself as the sprout king, who you are.

You have the most boring job this side of the galaxy: Moon Defender. But at least they pay you by the minute, and the pay is not that bad.

Keep an eye on the news feed, as a (not so great) mystery unfolds in front of your own eyes.

We hope you enjoy our (hastily and unprofessionally made) game.

title: Flippum
description:
Flippum is a game with simplistic, addicting, amusing, and rewarding gameplay. Climb higher into this 2D Paradise by defying gravity. With the tap of your finger, your awesome looking block will travel from the side of the screen. Use this super power to avoid cruel spikes in this obstacle course, and collect StarCoins. Why collect StarCoins? So that you can upgrade your box with the latest new style.

How do you avoid the spikes? It's simple! Your box will automatically travel to one side of your device. When you want to go the other direction, just tap the screen! Your box will go in the opposite direction until you let go of your screen. Be warned though, the spikes will sometimes taunt your box into going the opposite direction, so when you see the warning arrows go up, it’s time to put your focus to work as your box switches directions.

WARNING! Be careful not to share this game with your friends. It’s highly competitive, and if you only have one device, you’ll probably never get a turn!

A special thanks to Antis Instrumentals for groovy game music!

title: Jackal Top Gunner: Rocket Jeep
description:
Jackal Top Gunner: Rocket Jeep is an overhead run'n gun-style shoot-'em-up android game.Jackal Top Gunner: Rocket Jeep can be played by up to two players simultaneously. A second player can join in during play anytime and the two jeeps are numbered on their hoods to indicate which player is controlling it. The controls consists of an eight way joystick and two attack buttons. The first button fires the jeep's machine gun turret (which always shoots northward), while the second button is used to launch grenades towards the direction the jeep is facing. The grenade launcher can be upgraded into a missile launcher, which can be further upgraded up to three times, giving it a longer reach and then allowing it to fire shrapnel rounds that spreads in to two or four directions. The machine gun has weaker firepower but a faster firing rate, while the grenade/missile launcher can destroy most enemy vehicles and artillery in one shot, as well as destroy gates and buildings.

The game starts with a pair of transport helicopters dropping player's jeep into the coast of the enemy territory, followed by a plane which drops the jeep's driver and gunner. The main objective is to penetrate the enemy's main headquarters and destroy their ultimate weapon. Along the way, the player will proceed through numerous internment camps where the POWs are being held. Prisoners held in solitary camps will upgrade the jeep's grenade/missile launcher by one level. The player's jeep can only carry up to eight prisoners and once it is filled, the player must drive to the nearest heliport where an extraction chopper awaits to retrieve them. The player receives more points if he extracts prisoners in succession. If the player successfully extracts eight prisoners in a row into the chopper, the jeep's missile launcher will be upgraded to the next level. Jackal Top Gunner: Rocket Jeep does not have a traditional stage structure, instead the entire game takes place in one long continuous level. The player will go through a variety of different areas throughout the course of the mission such as an ancient ruins, a lake, a hill and a mountain before reaching the enemy headquarters. The background music changes the further the players goes into the game.

The player's jeep can run over foot soldiers, but will be destroyed if it gets shot by a projectile or collides with an enemy vehicle. When the player's jeep is destroyed, a replacement jeep will appear and the missile launcher that will be downgraded by one level. If the previous jeep was carrying POWs, the survivors will spread themselves out from the wreckage, waiting to be picked up again. An extra jeep can be obtained by obtaining a certain number of points. The game ends when the player accomplishes his mission or runs out of replacement jeeps. A map is shown at the game over screen showing how far the player has progressed. 

Join the battle of gunner now !

title: Paint Helix
description:
A casual game by definition is a game that requires very little effort to learn and very little time needed for each play through. you're looking for color shoot paint game paint games paint it painted hit hit point khinfe hit hit colorful hit games hit game you are welcome here.
That’s probably why they’re so popular because you can literally just pick it up and play for a few minutes at a time while your waiting around for an appointment or sitting on the toilet.  Even though I would consider myself a hardcore gamer, I still indulge in some casual gaming. One of the newest games I’m checking out is called Paint Helix and it pretty much fits that casual game description to a T.
In Paint Helix players shoot paint balls to color spinning towers over hundreds of increasingly challenging levels. With each paintball throw players color a part of the tower, making it increasingly difficult to hit uncolored portions with the next attempt. If a shot lands on an area of the tower that they’ve already painted, they lose the round. Accuracy is key here.
The game really isn’t very hard and is super easy to pick up. It’s one of those time waster games that kinda sucks you in as you complete level after level in quick 5 target waves. You get 5 lives to complete each wave, and in all likelihood, you’re going to beat it if you just take your time. That’s the key.
With that said, Paint Helix while it may seem challenging in concept, really isn’t. It’s super simple to play and if you just want a game to kill time that you know you can win at, give Paint Helix a go.

title: 🍄64 games - Super Adam Adventure&Jungle Adventure
description:
🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹
64 Games – Super Adam Adventure is a 2D platformer openly inspired on a Classic Famous Game .

The main character eats hamburgers and grows taller, he throws baseballs. When your hero is big he can withstand a hit from an enemy, and the baseballs can be used to kill enemies at a distance.

It's visually very similar or the main character is almost identical to the classic Games , and  the gameplay and levels are almost bring the same fun  too.

You can play on several dozen levels split over 3 different worlds. There, you can find nine different types of enemies, although the main challenge is always posed by the platforms, cliffs, and jumps you have to make.
🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹🕹


🌟HOW TO PLAY🌟
🕹Press Left or Right to make the hero move
🕹 Press the Jump Button to make the hero jump and kill the enemies
🕹Press fire button to thros base balls
🕹You can get into the underground world  throw the pipe

🌟FEATURES🌟
🍄 Skip to hit enemies, brake bricks to release powers, collect magic items to become bigger and face the sliding turtles.
🍄Discover the hidden world of Dungoen, the most outstanding feature of the game.
🍄Start living the magic with Super Adam Adventure, collect coins, magical items, and defeat more than ten enemies that will be ready to attack you!
🍄Jump using your powers, defend yourself and show that you’re the real hero!
🍄Jump the most you can and evade the obstacles, score points and have fun like never before.
🍄Enjoy fantastic graphics and animations.
🍄Music and sound will add more excitement to your game.
🍄Face your most feared enemies: the serpent, the giant snail, lances and many more.
🍄Play with the 3 magic objects to help you on each of your games，more world will -coming soon
🍄Collect stars and collect coins. Challenge your friends in this unparalleled adventure and get ready to win!

👍Now, it's time to Jump,Jump and Jump. Just install the game and enjoy the fun of Jump.

Thank you!

description:
"Dino Rush, Dinosaur run and jump" is a side scrolling 2d game for young kids, toddlers and all ages.
Help the beloved and beautiful two little dinosaurs to get back to his timeline by avoiding different obstacles and enemies in your road; they will harm you.
While you run through various magical world don't forget to collect some delicious white cupcakes so the unicorn won't get exhausted from hunger.
Complete all the levels and unlock the five beautiful worlds in the game.

How to Play "Dino Rush, Dinosaur run and jump":

- Choose the Dinosaur That you like.
- Two dinosaurs are available, a cute red little dino and a beautiful green dinosaur.
- Tap anywhere on the screen to make a little dinosaur jump.
- Jump over the spikes in your way.
- Avoid the Obstacles in your way by jumping off them.
- Escape over the rainbow to pass the level.
- Complete all the levels of the world to unlock the next world.
- Unlock all the five worlds.

Features Of "Dino Rush, Dinosaur run and jump":

- Two beautiful dinosaurs you can choose from.
- 5 amazing worlds unlock.
- Amazing run and jump dino Game Compatible for kids of all ages.

- Complete all the levels of the world to unlock the next world.
- Unlock all the five worlds.

Features Of "Dino Rush, Dinosaur run and jump":

- 5 amazing worlds unlock.

title: Stickman Archery - Gibbets Bow Master
description:
Gibbets need rescue let become Bow Master now !!!
Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!

This is casual action arcade puzzle game based on physics with shooting, bows, arrows, ropes and archers. Now it's time to get your own back on that noose-wielding bully! Gibbets, the sequel to the Flash smash hit, gives you chance to save the poor victims before they run out of breath! A truly innovative arcade puzzler where you'll have to aim your bow and arrow carefully to cut the hangman's rope without causing the victims further injury! Use all manner of bonuses and pick ups, warps and teleports, to help you on your quest. You'll gain bonus points for rescuing multiple people with one arrow so try and gain the perfect score on each level. Accumulate even more points with the vulture blasting bonus round, then upload your high scores to challenge your friends! Can you the handle the frantic pace and save the innocent before they take their final breath?


• Draw back your bow in this truly unique game of skill.
• Save the innocent people from hanging in over 50 challenging levels. 
• Master the use of portals and pick ups across the colourful detailed landscapes.
• Unlock awards and achievements for your expert bowmanship
• The sequel to the million selling hit on various platforms.

description:
The temple-adventures-loving fans can now be a Temple Hero Raider in this endless Lara Tomb Running game. Be a real runner and explore the ancient tombs and old-time temples. Collect relics and find the hidden treasures in the old temples and ancient tombs. Complete the ghost hero running in this tomb running game. Cover multiple adventures and reach the ultimate heights. Be the best runner in the temple city and the tomb town, and escape the scary monsters and evil demons. Start the lost jungle run and achieve the maximum score to make the highest score of all time. Be the best temple adventure runner and jump from high cliffs, slide up to cross the broken bridges.
Start uncovering ancient relics while subway running through endless mountain tracks. Reach the ultimate heights on the sky-high paths. Jump to cross the gaps in between the tracks. There is an ancient temple jungle just outside the tomb city waiting for you to experience the ultimate running and endless raiding. Find the artifacts in the old temples and dark objects in the ancient tombs. Run with Lara hero craft runner in the snowy grey temples. Run in the endless mode to fast run freely. Escape the scary monsters and deadly demons by fast running in the temple city. Collect coins and pick up powerups to enjoy the super magic. Ultra-magnet power pulls all the coins towards you.
Play this endless Lara tomb running game to become the best temple hero raider. Avoid hitting obstacles and escape the monstrous demons in your path. There are floating objects and artifacts in the air, catch them to be the fastest tomb hero runner. title: Revenge of the Titanic
description:
After slumbering at the bottom of the sea for over a century, the HMS Titanic has risen from the depths, and is looking for revenge.  Locked and loaded, guide the Titanic in this naval arcade shooter to destroy all ice burgs.  That's not all though, as along the way you will encounter enemy ships, planes, mines, and rocket platforms!  This is the Titanic like you've never seen it before.  Will the Titanic finally make it across the Atlantic, or will it return to the bottom of the sea?  Gear up, load your cannons, and find out in this epic ocean adventure.  Play Revenge of the Titanic today!

Clenched Teeth Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

title: Cashflow Rush: Money & Cash Game - Get Rich Quick
description:
Are you going to be rich? 

Money is hard to get. But not in this game.
Tap to collect as much money as you can, within 30 seconds.

But wait - I hear you saying.
Is this just another idle cash clicker game?
Nope - this is an active cash clicker game. 

But what's the deal? Why should I play this game?
Each game lasts 30 seconds. Within those 30 seconds, you need to collect as much cash as possible. Then you can compare how much cash you made on the global leaderboard and see if you're one of the best. 

So, do you love money? 
Download Cashflow Rush and let the party begin!

title: Knife Hit  Fruits
description:
Best Knife Hit  game of 2018 Fruit Master Knife Hit

Fruit Master Knife Hit is a very fun and exciting knife throwing game.
The objective of this game is to cut and stab all the rotating targets; These goals are fruits. It is easy to control, just with one finger, just touch the knife to throw it. Be careful, if any of your blades do not cut the fruit, you fail the level!

With the coins you earn, you can get cooler knives, swords and daggers from the store.

HOW TO PLAY
• Simply touch the screen to throw the knives.
• Fruits can rotate clockwise or counterclockwise, and change speed all the time!

Fruit Knife Hit:

Measure your knife throws carefully and cut several fruits at once to get an extra score!

You must be agile and precise: You will get a cocktail of fruit juice for each level completed.

Are you able to reach level 100? Are you a ninja?

title: BTS Superstar Game
description:
BTS Supertar Games is s new game for all the BTS Idol fans out there.

BTS is a South Korean boy group formed by Big Hit Entertainment. Composed of seven members: Rap Monster (Kim Namjoon; 
김남준); Jin (Kim Seokjin; 김석진); Suga (Min Yoongi; 민윤기); J-Hope (Jung Hoseok; 정호석); Jimin (Park Jimin; 박지민); V (Kim 
Taehyung; 김태형); Jungkook (Jeon Jeongguk; 전정국)

How to play:
- Match 3 same Oppa pics to earn points.
- Match over 4 Oppa pics to obtain specials. 
- Combine the powerful specials to gain an epic elimination!
- Complete your missions within a given number of moves!

Features:
- Easy addictive casual strategy game, loved by both men and women.
- Brain puzzle game, easy to play, hard to master.
- Exquisite gameplay, experience, graphics and puzzles, and the fun is fun.
- No life limit, you can play unlimited, all free.
- No need to use traffic, you can play anywhere, anytime.
- Support all tablets and full screen.


This game is very fun and relaxing way to kill time :)

title: Zombie Shooter Apocalypse Contract Killer King 3D
description:
A virus unlike anything we've seen before has spread like wildfire around the city. Everyday people going about their business have been transformed into creatures that will kill any living thing they come across. 
Survivors have fled, hoping to escape, but this is now a city of the dead. Those residents lucky enough to still be alive are hidden in warehouses, loft, supermarkets or anywhere else they can find, waiting to be rescued. 
The whold city seems to be so horrible, you have to take something now.

Your only chance for survival is to use all of the available shooting arsenals to keep the zombie at distance. The demon portal has brought a selection of WW2 weapons back from the past.
For the tightest situations with the dead, you can grab a sentry turret for duty, with the fully automated target system, loaded with lead and upgradable with unique traits to give you an even bigger edge over the dead zombies.
Try to take a headshot target kill. This will help you to shoot more zombies by saving your hunting gun ammo. A sensational nonstop curiosity in which you have to become target shooter of dead zombies. 
You get a thrilling campaign, challenging boss fights and some slick graphics. The campaign will last a long time, you have to win that campaign, or you will die, other residents of this city will also die. 

Nazi Zombie killing games reach the absolute top in this extremely advanced 3D shooter. The dead are relentless, if you're not the hunter then you have to ask yourself – 'hunt or be hunted?'. 
Target the zombies, keep shooting and never let go of the trigger, because the ammo is free and unlimited. Guns have different sound effects to represent their real-life versions. And never forget - even in the apocalypse you 
can still have fun. Your shooting experience is optimized for maximum adrenaline.


Zombie Shooter Apocalypse Contract Killer King 3D Features：

- An immersive first-person 3D adventure blending stunning graphics, excellent music and realistic sound effects to create a highly detailed world.
- Over 16 classic weapons to choose from including Crossbow, P90, Katana, Chainsaw, Shotgun and Dragunov. Every weapon has been realistically recreated and each has a unique feel and performance.
- Multiple Zombie enemies to challenge your skills. The hordes of undead will keep you on your toes and your finger on the trigger.
- Smooth, intuitive controls allow you to navigate the city with ease. Precision aiming will help you take down zombies and rack up kill streaks.
- The virus is getting stronger over time and the zombies are getting more powerful. You need to keep fighting to rescue survivors and save the city.

Nazi Zombie killing games reach the absolute top in this extremely advanced 3D shooter. The dead are relentless, if you're not the hunter then you have to ask yourself – 'hunt or be hunted?'.
Target the zombies, keep shooting and never let go of the trigger, because the ammo is free and unlimited. Guns have different sound effects to represent their real-life versions. And never forget - even in the apocalypse you
can still have fun. Your shooting experience is optimized for maximum adrenaline.


Zombie Shooter Apocalypse Contract Killer King 3D Features：

- An immersive first-person 3D adventure blending stunning graphics, excellent music and realistic sound effects to create a highly detailed world.
- Over 16 classic weapons to choose from including Crossbow, P90, Katana, Chainsaw, Shotgun and Dragunov. Every weapon has been realistically recreated and each has a unique feel and performance.
- Multiple Zombie enemies to challenge your skills. The hordes of undead will keep you on your toes and your finger on the trigger.
- Smooth, intuitive controls allow you to navigate the city with ease. Precision aiming will help you take down zombies and rack up kill streaks.
- The virus is getting stronger over time and the zombies are getting more powerful. You need to keep fighting to rescue survivors and save the city.
summary: Take a Chainsaw, kill all zombies, take a headshot target kill, save residents.

title: Sushi Slap!
description:
Play as PanPan, a giant squid sushi chef who must feed waves of hangry impatient customers by slap feeding them, or by using his legendary sushi abilities. Along the way upgrade your abilities and unlock custom cosplays through themed challenges. Just don't let your customers eat you!

Features

★Legendary squid sushi chef (PanPan)
★Unique sushi making and delivering gameplay
★16 levels with an endless mode after level 16
★ lots of custom cosplays and challenges

Story 

In Sushi Slap you play as Panpan, the legendary squid sushi chef. Panpan's simple method of making and delivering sushi is world famous, attracting schools of hungry customers to his sushi dojo each day.  His customers aren't patient and will bite the tentacle that feeds them if you aren't quick. Luckily Panpan comes with many upgradable sushi abilities to fish out hangry customers. Panpan also enjoys cosplaying from time to time, which means slapping customers in style if you can beat or find Panpan's challenges and secrets. Sushi Slap offers 16 catered waves of fun with an endless mode to unlock after you beat wave 16. Sushi Slap is a blast for all ages, just remember: 

In a fish eat fish world you either make sushi or become sushi!

title: One Color Wheel
description:
This is minimalist, simple tap tap game.

The theme of the game is to transform a multi colored segmented wheel to a single color wheel.

This is a level game. A segmented wheel is rotating clockwise in each level. Each segment has a different color. There are also different color balls at the bottom. Tap anywhere on the screen to shoot the ball. After shooting the ball, when ball touches the segment of the wheel, that segment of the wheel changes its color to ball color.

You are free to make any one color out of several colors the wheel is made of.
There are 25 levels which will open one after one. As you move to higher levels you will find more complexity. Each level is tough and interesting.

As you can see in screenshots, it is perfectly equipped with soothing and eye catching graphics. Overall the game is completely organic and supports ecosystem. 

Enough description! For more, Please Download and Play, you will definitely enjoy the game.

Optimised Android and Google play games. Supports both phones and Tablets. 

Play and Enjoy the game.

title: Endless Pig Jump
description:
How high can we go? to vast spaces?
Endless Pig Jump is infinite jump game plus shooting game. The objective of the game is to go as high as you can, avoiding enemies. Bouncing from platform to platform avoid the bad birds, airplanes, monsters, aliens.
It is really challenging, fun and fast paced... Enjoy!

This is the perfect casual game! 
Warning!!! Endless Pig Jump is so Addictive!!!

Features:
- Broken, Moving, Disappearing and Exploding platforms
- Jet Pack, Propellers and springs that fly you higher
- UFOs, heroes, hot air ballons, and many other monsters!!
- Jump on monsters to bring them down.
- incredibly fun
- Autoshot button
- Vast Spaces
- Leaderboard

Instructions:
- Go as high as you can. 
- Use a never-ending series of platforms (clouds and stones, blocks) to jump up without falling.
- Avoid the birds,airplanes,enemies, and other all objects, but you can stomp them.
- Tilt your device to control the Pig(left or right direction).
- It is a wrap world where the left and right edges are connected. 
- Tap the screen to shoot(You can automatically shoot with auto shot button).

------
*. Characters will be added.
*. Jump height upgrade and rainbow shot upgraded will be added soon.
*. Now working on the problem about slowing down on Android 6.0 device.

title: Hole Defence: Endless Epic Battle
description:
Control the hole and defend your castle!
Hole Defence is a unique and fun game that challenges veteran players

You are under an endless attack! And you have only a hole for defending your castle.
Oh I almost forgot, also there is a group of crazy seagulls too!

Gameplay is simple: Just drag your finger to move your hole and eat all attackers.
Be careful, attacks are getting harder in each wave and timing is the key point in this game.

Try to collect coins, energy and healh packs while struggling with the attacks.
Do your best and compete against your friends and the world in global leaderboard

Game Features:
🔹 One finger control: Game controls are really simple, you can control the hole by only one finger.
🔸 Upgrade your castle with the collected coins and last longer.
🔹 Easy to play : beginner players can also play and enjoy the game.
🔸 Hard to master : there are endless attacks for veteran players.
🔹 Does not require internet connection!
🔸 Challenge your friends for the highest score.
🔹 Use boosters if the attacks put you in a difficult situation.
🔸 Seagulls attack : Ask for help from the seagulls, and watch what they will do.
🔹 Slow Down Time : You can slow down the time whenever you want.

Earth is in Danger, shoot them all Alien chickens. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil chicken enemies. title: Super Oscar Runner
description:
Have you ever wondered how Super Oscar trains to be able to complete all amazing worlds?! Probably not! However this game will answer that question!

title: Billiards Online
description:
Billiards Online is an online multiplayer game, you can play with your friends online, with guests, make new friends or in global rooms by paying entry fee. There are various rooms that are planned to be launched , currently there are two rooms, they are London and Moscow with entry fee as 50 and 500.

Billiards online 8 ball game has different rules for different rooms like standard, call pocket on 8 ball, call pocket on all shots and no guidelines.

Features of game:
- Global rooms to play online pool
- currently there are two rooms, more to be released soon
  • London
  • Moscow
- challenge your friends
- different rooms with different rules like
  • standard
  • call pocket on 8 ball
  • call pocket on all shots
  • no guidelines
- buy new cues to dominate your opponent with more sight and more force
- Share with your FB friends

Billiards online 8 ball game is the best and simple that just focuses on game play rather than distracting objects like chests, wheel, etc. Just Enjoy the game!

If you have any suggestions and feedback regarding 8 ball online multiplayer pool game just contact us via email or on our facebook page.

title: Pew-Pew's Castle
description:
The galaxy is at war and you pilot a lone golden razor attack ship on a suicide mission in the outer regions. Your mission is to destroy the nefarious Dr. Pew-Pew's castle protected by rotating energy rings, relentless attack drones, zombie asteroids, and saucers. Only the bravest and most skillful will survive beyond the first few levels.

Shoot a hole through the rotating energy rings and then shoot Dr. Pew-Pew's castle. Don't destroy all of the outer-ring segments or the rings will regenerate. Watch out for wandering asteroids and avoid the enemy drones that spawn from the  castle.

Pew-Pew's Castle is a lively, retro, vector, twin-stick arcade shooter (AKA shmup). Like chocolate and peanut butter, it combines elements reminiscent of Star Castle and Asteroids into one intensely fun game with modern controls and sound-track. A great game for fans of Geometry Wars and PewPew as well as the 80's classics!

The game includes two different play modes.
- Remix has a variety of challenging enemies and castles as well as asteroids.
- Classic is a trip back in time to 1980 for the purists.

Classic is free and Remix has a free trial period. This game does not contain ads and has a super-cheap, one-time in-app purchase to unlock Remix after the trial period is over.

title: She's Outthere
description:
Ivy was a famous scientist working for the military until she invented “targeting shapes” which her hometown folks thought were crazy and extremely dangerous. The city told Ivy to stop developing the weapons but she refused and the city kick her out of town. This drove Ivy mad and coo-coo and now she using her new inventions to get revenge against the people who ran her out of town. 

While Ivy was on her rampage to destroy the people of the city, Snap and Trip snuck into her lab and took two of her prized cannons and are now trying to stop her. Needless to say, the actions of our hero’s didn’t go over well with Ivy.  

Help Snap and Trip foil Ivy’s plan of destroying the city!

title: Duck Hunt - 2018
description:
Get ready for the new duck hunting season with this brand new Duck shooting game, use the duck caller to call in the mallards but don't shoot the black birds. Become the next best duck hunter of 2018 a Duck hunter pro and share your score with your mates in Frenzy Mode. Load up your shotgun and blast your way to the top of the leaderboards, Its fun easy to use controls to shot those ducks. This will be alot of fun calling in the drake.

HOW TO PLAY

- use duck caller to start the match.
- use the arrows to aim/rotate gun left or right.
- each level has a set amount of ducks to shoot, reach that amount to advance to the next level.
- don't shoot the black birds, that will end the match.

FRENZY MODE

- don't shoot the black birds.
- your highscore will show at the end of the match.
- try beat your own highscore and share with your friends
