title: Circus Clown Bubble Shooter Pop
description:
circus clown bubble

Save all the circus animals and travel in an air balloon across all over the world. The funny clown will always help along your adventure. Overcome him by matching pop to create rainbow bomb and blast to save every animal you find in journey! Download the Classic and super addictive little clown circus bubble shooter game on google play - for free and enjoy the top bubble buster game. This awesome shooter is for all of you puzzle fans who want to train your brain and solve the color ball challenges. Don’t wait any longer to enjoy this addictive, relaxing and fun bubble popper!
Fun and Free Crush Bubble Mania Deluxe with scary joker clown character for haloween in this year. The Bubbles are very many like zombie , you must destroy fast with your combos to get 3 stars . Train your hand , if you can be quick you will see magic like wizards and witch in your highscore. Rescue your friends from bubble. Bubble Haloween Game make your haloween more real. This Bubble Island and Bubble World with haloween theme.
Help freedy the scary joker clown to pop out the haloween pumpkins . if creepy haloween in the nights make your haloween boring you must try this amazing clown bubble combo games. This evil death clown is the fighter in the emperor and come to our dreams to give us choice to play or death .
Roller coaster Bubble Shooter will take you on a fantasy dream trip through fame and fortune. 
Begin your Journey Adventure while you are solving Fun puzzles across 720 exciting levels full of Stunning Balloon islands, Beautiful Forest, frozen Ice river and colorful Clown fields.
Switch and Match between 3 or more Beautiful shining Balloons clown craft and make a Clash of Blaze to Blast them and achieve your goals in great epic explosions.
Circus puzzle takes children on a journey through a circus, where they encounter a wide variety of clowns and animals
in this unique sandbox you have to make a choice and to fight against hordes of crazy clowns or to intimidate mankind and play for one of the kings of the Clown! 

Features:
• Many Deluxe Bubbles to Burst and POP clown craft
• Addictive gameplay, once you start – you can’t stop playing.
• Specially magic bubble puzzles clown
• High score table, Challenging achievements on a magical roller coaster.
• Every color you clear will not appear again. Pop all the bubbles!
• Choose your aiming method between Laser, Crosshair or simply Taping on the screen
• Clear all bubble pumpkins as fast as you can because you have limited time to crush all the bubbles.
• Includes explained clown craft tutorial adventure for playing
• Switch and match 3 Balloons to be the King of this Game.
• This bubble shooting game is suited for all people

How to Play our game?
* Drag your finger to move the laser aiming
* Connect and Blast 3 or more bubbles pumpkin to pop and get score .
* Lift your finger to shoot bubbles.
* Match 3 bubbles or more of the same color to pop and clear the screen.
Circus Match Games
Make this Balloon Fever to splash and clear the Circus land before you run out of time. Create Super power boosts by making smart match moves to make a bigger blast with Deluxe animation effects and flying stars to earn large amount of Gold points.
So, what are you waiting for? Just download this amazing bubble mania deluxe ball shooting game and experience one of the top bubble shooting games.

title: Candy Splashy Jump
description:
Endless Jumping Game for everyone

Splashy Ball Jumping is a worldwide popular game among children and adults, created for those who like the adventure of bricks.
Earn points and collect gems. Unlock over awesome balls. Challenge your friends and family to beat your score. Can you become the Space Hop champion of the universe?
Swipe your finger on the screen and jump on the blocks to hop around in space but make sure you don't fall off the edge. How far can you hop before you fall off the edge?
 is an addictive endless jumper game in which you touch and hold the screen to control the ball jumping around, try not to run out of the path and touch the obstacles, collect coins to unlock new ball
Enjoy it.
Keep Jumping!!
Splashy ball jump is crazy ball jumping game with very addictive game-play. Jump and swipe for find out new difficulties.

Test your skills on a moving and spiky forever coming tiles. Avoid falling down or touching spikes and collect the shiny gems to unlock new skins for the ball.

How to play: 🎮 
🔸 Simply touch and swipe your finger to move the ball.

Game Features:
✔️ Simple and easy game to play with one-touch control
✔️ Catchy color combinations
✔️ Super addictive jumping game 
✔️ Beautiful, stunning and smooth interface

How to play Splashy Ball?
- Touch the screen and move your finger to move the ball.
- Collect the bricks crystals on your way
- Set records, passing as far as possible
Move the ball left and right and bounce the ball.
How far can you go?
Score highest points and challenge your friends.
Key Features:
- Simple and Easy game to play with one-touch controls
- Catchy color Combinations
- You can change your ball
- Best stress releaser
- Beautiful, stunning and smooth interface

Download this game now and enjoy !!

title: Trump World Tour: Super Adventure
description:
If you are a lover of super running adventures then this game is best for you to play. Enjoy the best trump running adventures on endless tracks and explore the super jungle world.

title: Color Snake
description:
OVERVIEW
Relive the thrill of the sensational classic!
Slide your way through colorful puzzles to see how far you can go! 
Swipe your finger to guide a snake of balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest snake ever!

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!

HOW TO PLAY
Control the snake to break the obstacles of YOUR color.

Avoid other colors!

Collect the coins to customize your play!

HIGHLIGHT FEATURE
- The game is very simple but very addictive
- Simple color graphics attract
- The number of large screen play to explore
- Control mode is easy
-Beautiful effect
Enjoy !

title: Ring Toss - Handheld Rings stack water game
description:
Ring Toss handheld Water Sports is one of the amazing retro games with color rings. Rings stack give you chance to dive into your past and remember your childhood of the 1990s. On 1st tap tap, the lots of childhood memories blink in your mastermind. Waterful Splash circle wonder with water bubbles. Carnival Ring tosses retro is the most super addictive with color rings puzzle game of 2018. carnival ring toss and bottle ring toss you played in your old school but now you can play water sports on your mobile. Handheld water bubble press game to make the stack and all the rings go on the spike. Tap tap and spin the rings.
Flip and stack ring into the water. Just pump air by click the bubble shoot button. Let rings stack to move right or left in blue water toss 3D gameplay. It is a challenging rings puzzle game. Control the circle and filling up the stack with spin rings. When you are playing,  definitely remind your hand games. Tossing sonic rings in water bubbles with impressive 3D deep sea environment. Ring toss handheld ring stack water bubble free game. Ring always home but now you see in the water. Carnival toss 3D is incredible, which make you a super hero of aqua world. Its not a wedding ring or lord ring, there are just multi-color rings! Tilt your mobile with energetic force and control the bubble power. 
Tap on the water and make a perfect angle and push power rings to hooked on the stack. when the flappy ring on a wave and reaches the center of the stack. Just like sea fishing with a hook. Carnival Rings Stack with Free Ring Toss and smash to get the target. It is an adventurous game with multi-levels. where you would complete challenging the levels at the minimum time with bubble shooter fun. Make Fast decisions by pushing magic color rings like the toss boss to be hooked the hope. The oscillating Ring makes Stack Tower filled with magic rings! Carnival Rings Stack waterful Free Ring Toss is available for smart mobiles with different amazing and difficult levels. Astonishing and addictive for water lover.

title: BallDrop
description: As the balls drop, quickly draw a line with your hand to guide them to the baskets. You will need to time your moves carefully, watch out for bombs and collect all the crystals for extra perks!

title: Galaxy Chicken - Angry Chicken
description:
If you like space attack or chicken shooter game, sure you will like Galaxy Chicken - Angry Chicken. Let's destroy enemies and take control the galaxy chicken. 

Take control of the galaxy and protect earth from attacking chickens alien, human perdition is on your hands. Your mission will be challenge you to keep the Earth far away the battle agains intergalactic chickens. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its intergalactic chickens. In this game the chickens want to attack the earth and we must defend ourselves. 

In this "bullet hell" shooter game, you will be faced with an increasingly large number of projectiles and enemies. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to bring it to full lethal capacity.

FEATURES:
- Dynamic sound, beautiful graphics, immense space
- Free to play
- Upgrade your guns and lasers.
- Ability to use active skills during the space battles giving you hours of fun for you and your friends.
- Fast smooth action on phone or tablet.
- Rich attack patterns and transformations.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Move your plane to destroy the enemy in the correct and standard way
- Avoid weapons from enemies by moving up, left, or right
- Collect items to upgrade or change your weapons.

title: Knife Frenzy 2
description:
Endless knife challenges are coming!
Grab the knife or dagger to hit!

Shoot and throw knives to hit the log and break it. your job is to make knives to defeat your enemies. you can obtain a lot of knives when you slash the maximum you can. Hit bosses in every 5 stages and get valuable knives!

Be carful of the existed knives and the spikes around target and logs. Aim, throw and hit, prove yourself to be the master of knife!
